00121 void clear_workob(Object *workob)
00122 {
00123     memset(workob, 0, sizeof(Object));
00124     
00125     workob->size[0]= workob->size[1]= workob->size[2]= 1.0f;
00126     workob->dscale[0]= workob->dscale[1]= workob->dscale[2]= 1.0f;
00127     workob->rotmode= ROT_MODE_EUL;
00128 }

00130 void copy_baseflags(struct Scene *scene)
00131 {
00132     Base *base= scene->base.first;
00133     
00134     while (base) {
00135         base->object->flag= base->flag;
00136         base= base->next;
00137     }
00138 }

00150 void update_base_layer(struct Scene *scene, Object *ob)
00151 {
00152     Base *base= scene->base.first;
00153 
00154     while (base) {
00155         if (base->object == ob) base->lay= ob->lay;
00156         base= base->next;
00157     }

00160 void object_free_particlesystems(Object *ob)
00161 {
00162     while (ob->particlesystem.first) {
00163         ParticleSystem *psys = ob->particlesystem.first;
00164         
00165         BLI_remlink(&ob->particlesystem,psys);
00166         
00167         psys_free(ob,psys);
00168     }
00169 }

00187 void object_free_modifiers(Object *ob)
00188 {
00189     while (ob->modifiers.first) {
00190         ModifierData *md = ob->modifiers.first;
00191         
00192         BLI_remlink(&ob->modifiers, md);
00193         
00194         modifier_free(md);
00195     }
00196 
00197     /* particle modifiers were freed, so free the particlesystems as well */
00198     object_free_particlesystems(ob);
00199 
00200     /* same for softbody */
00201     object_free_softbody(ob);
00202 }

00204 int object_support_modifier_type(Object *ob, int modifier_type)
00205 {
00206     ModifierTypeInfo *mti;
00207 
00208     mti = modifierType_getInfo(modifier_type);
00209 
00210     if (!((mti->flags & eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsCVs) ||
00211          (ob->type==OB_MESH && (mti->flags & eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh))))
00212     {
00213             return FALSE;
00214     }
00215 
00216     return TRUE;
00217 }
00218 
00219 void object_link_modifiers(struct Object *ob, struct Object *from)
00220 {
00221     ModifierData *md;
00222     object_free_modifiers(ob);
00223 
00224     if (!ELEM5(ob->type, OB_MESH, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_FONT, OB_LATTICE)) {
00225         /* only objects listed above can have modifiers and linking them to objects
00226          * which doesn't have modifiers stack is quite silly */
00227         return;
00228     }
00229 
00230     for (md=from->modifiers.first; md; md=md->next) {
00231         ModifierData *nmd = NULL;
00232 
00233         if (ELEM4(md->type, eModifierType_Hook, eModifierType_Softbody, eModifierType_ParticleInstance, eModifierType_Collision)) continue;
00234 
00235         if (!object_support_modifier_type(ob, md->type))
00236             continue;
00237 
00238         nmd = modifier_new(md->type);
00239         modifier_copyData(md, nmd);
00240         BLI_addtail(&ob->modifiers, nmd);
00241     }
00242 
00243     copy_object_particlesystems(ob, from);
00244     copy_object_softbody(ob, from);
00245 
00246     // TODO: smoke?, cloth?
00247 }

00249 /* here we will collect all local displist stuff */
00250 /* also (ab)used in depsgraph */
00251 void object_free_display(Object *ob)
00252 {
00253     if (ob->derivedDeform) {
00254         ob->derivedDeform->needsFree = 1;
00255         ob->derivedDeform->release(ob->derivedDeform);
00256         ob->derivedDeform= NULL;
00257     }
00258     if (ob->derivedFinal) {
00259         ob->derivedFinal->needsFree = 1;
00260         ob->derivedFinal->release(ob->derivedFinal);
00261         ob->derivedFinal= NULL;
00262     }
00263     
00264     freedisplist(&ob->disp);
00265 }

00267 void free_sculptsession_deformMats(SculptSession *ss)
00268 {
00269     if (ss->orig_cos) MEM_freeN(ss->orig_cos);
00270     if (ss->deform_cos) MEM_freeN(ss->deform_cos);
00271     if (ss->deform_imats) MEM_freeN(ss->deform_imats);
00272 
00273     ss->orig_cos = NULL;
00274     ss->deform_cos = NULL;
00275     ss->deform_imats = NULL;
00276 }

00278 void free_sculptsession(Object *ob)
00279 {
00280     if (ob && ob->sculpt) {
00281         SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
00282         DerivedMesh *dm= ob->derivedFinal;
00283 
00284         if (ss->pbvh)
00285             BLI_pbvh_free(ss->pbvh);
00286         if (dm && dm->getPBVH)
00287             dm->getPBVH(NULL, dm); /* signal to clear */
00288 
00289         if (ss->texcache)
00290             MEM_freeN(ss->texcache);
00291 
00292         if (ss->layer_co)
00293             MEM_freeN(ss->layer_co);
00294 
00295         if (ss->orig_cos)
00296             MEM_freeN(ss->orig_cos);
00297         if (ss->deform_cos)
00298             MEM_freeN(ss->deform_cos);
00299         if (ss->deform_imats)
00300             MEM_freeN(ss->deform_imats);
00301 
00302         MEM_freeN(ss);
00303 
00304         ob->sculpt = NULL;
00305     }
00306 }

00309 /* do not free object itself */
00310 void free_object(Object *ob)
00311 {
00312     int a;
00313     
00314     object_free_display(ob);
00315     
00316     /* disconnect specific data */
00317     if (ob->data) {
00318         ID *id= ob->data;
00319         id->us--;
00320         if (id->us==0) {
00321             if (ob->type==OB_MESH) unlink_mesh(ob->data);
00322             else if (ob->type==OB_CURVE) unlink_curve(ob->data);
00323             else if (ob->type==OB_MBALL) unlink_mball(ob->data);
00324         }
00325         ob->data= NULL;
00326     }
00327     
00328     for (a=0; a<ob->totcol; a++) {
00329         if (ob->mat[a]) ob->mat[a]->id.us--;
00330     }
00331     if (ob->mat) MEM_freeN(ob->mat);
00332     if (ob->matbits) MEM_freeN(ob->matbits);
00333     ob->mat= NULL;
00334     ob->matbits= NULL;
00335     if (ob->bb) MEM_freeN(ob->bb); 
00336     ob->bb= NULL;
00337     if (ob->adt) BKE_free_animdata((ID *)ob);
00338     if (ob->poselib) ob->poselib->id.us--;
00339     if (ob->gpd) ((ID *)ob->gpd)->us--;
00340     if (ob->defbase.first)
00341         BLI_freelistN(&ob->defbase);
00342     if (ob->pose)
00343         free_pose(ob->pose);
00344     if (ob->mpath)
00345         animviz_free_motionpath(ob->mpath);
00346     free_properties(&ob->prop);
00347     object_free_modifiers(ob);
00348     
00349     free_sensors(&ob->sensors);
00350     free_controllers(&ob->controllers);
00351     free_actuators(&ob->actuators);
00352     
00353     free_constraints(&ob->constraints);
00354     
00355     free_partdeflect(ob->pd);
00356 
00357     if (ob->soft) sbFree(ob->soft);
00358     if (ob->bsoft) bsbFree(ob->bsoft);
00359     if (ob->gpulamp.first) GPU_lamp_free(ob);
00360 
00361     free_sculptsession(ob);
00362 
00363     if (ob->pc_ids.first) BLI_freelistN(&ob->pc_ids);
00364 }

00366 static void unlink_object__unlinkModifierLinks(void *userData, Object *ob, Object **obpoin)
00367 {
00368     Object *unlinkOb = userData;
00369 
00370     if (*obpoin==unlinkOb) {
00371         *obpoin = NULL;
00372         ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME; // XXX: should this just be OB_RECALC_DATA?
00373     }
00374 }
00375 
00376 void unlink_object(Object *ob)
00377 {
00378     Main *bmain= G.main;
00379     Object *obt;
00380     Material *mat;
00381     World *wrld;
00382     bScreen *sc;
00383     Scene *sce;
00384     Curve *cu;
00385     Tex *tex;
00386     Group *group;
00387     Camera *camera;
00388     bConstraint *con;
00389     //bActionStrip *strip; // XXX animsys 
00390     ModifierData *md;
00391     ARegion *ar;
00392     RegionView3D *rv3d;
00393     int a, found;
00394     
00395     unlink_controllers(&ob->controllers);
00396     unlink_actuators(&ob->actuators);
00397     
00398     /* check all objects: parents en bevels and fields, also from libraries */
00399     // FIXME: need to check all animation blocks (drivers)
00400     obt= bmain->object.first;
00401     while (obt) {
00402         if (obt->proxy==ob)
00403             obt->proxy= NULL;
00404         if (obt->proxy_from==ob) {
00405             obt->proxy_from= NULL;
00406             obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB;
00407         }
00408         if (obt->proxy_group==ob)
00409             obt->proxy_group= NULL;
00410         
00411         if (obt->parent==ob) {
00412             obt->parent= NULL;
00413             obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00414         }
00415         
00416         modifiers_foreachObjectLink(obt, unlink_object__unlinkModifierLinks, ob);
00417         
00418         if (ELEM(obt->type, OB_CURVE, OB_FONT)) {
00419             cu= obt->data;
00420 
00421             if (cu->bevobj==ob) {
00422                 cu->bevobj= NULL;
00423                 obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00424             }
00425             if (cu->taperobj==ob) {
00426                 cu->taperobj= NULL;
00427                 obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00428             }
00429             if (cu->textoncurve==ob) {
00430                 cu->textoncurve= NULL;
00431                 obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00432             }
00433         }
00434         else if (obt->type==OB_ARMATURE && obt->pose) {
00435             bPoseChannel *pchan;
00436             for (pchan= obt->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
00437                 for (con = pchan->constraints.first; con; con=con->next) {
00438                     bConstraintTypeInfo *cti= constraint_get_typeinfo(con);
00439                     ListBase targets = {NULL, NULL};
00440                     bConstraintTarget *ct;
00441                     
00442                     if (cti && cti->get_constraint_targets) {
00443                         cti->get_constraint_targets(con, &targets);
00444                         
00445                         for (ct= targets.first; ct; ct= ct->next) {
00446                             if (ct->tar == ob) {
00447                                 ct->tar = NULL;
00448                                 ct->subtarget[0]= '\0';
00449                                 obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
00450                             }
00451                         }
00452                         
00453                         if (cti->flush_constraint_targets)
00454                             cti->flush_constraint_targets(con, &targets, 0);
00455                     }
00456                 }
00457                 if (pchan->custom==ob)
00458                     pchan->custom= NULL;
00459             }
00460         } 
00461         else if (ELEM(OB_MBALL, ob->type, obt->type)) {
00462             if (is_mball_basis_for (obt, ob))
00463                 obt->recalc|= OB_RECALC_DATA;
00464         }
00465         
00466         sca_remove_ob_poin(obt, ob);
00467         
00468         for (con = obt->constraints.first; con; con=con->next) {
00469             bConstraintTypeInfo *cti= constraint_get_typeinfo(con);
00470             ListBase targets = {NULL, NULL};
00471             bConstraintTarget *ct;
00472             
00473             if (cti && cti->get_constraint_targets) {
00474                 cti->get_constraint_targets(con, &targets);
00475                 
00476                 for (ct= targets.first; ct; ct= ct->next) {
00477                     if (ct->tar == ob) {
00478                         ct->tar = NULL;
00479                         ct->subtarget[0]= '\0';
00480                         obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
00481                     }
00482                 }
00483                 
00484                 if (cti->flush_constraint_targets)
00485                     cti->flush_constraint_targets(con, &targets, 0);
00486             }
00487         }
00488         
00489         /* object is deflector or field */
00490         if (ob->pd) {
00491             if (obt->soft)
00492                 obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
00493 
00494             /* cloth */
00495             for (md=obt->modifiers.first; md; md=md->next)
00496                 if (md->type == eModifierType_Cloth)
00497                     obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
00498         }
00499         
00500         /* strips */
00501 #if 0 // XXX old animation system
00502         for (strip= obt->nlastrips.first; strip; strip= strip->next) {
00503             if (strip->object==ob)
00504                 strip->object= NULL;
00505             
00506             if (strip->modifiers.first) {
00507                 bActionModifier *amod;
00508                 for (amod= strip->modifiers.first; amod; amod= amod->next)
00509                     if (amod->ob==ob)
00510                         amod->ob= NULL;
00511             }
00512         }
00513 #endif // XXX old animation system
00514 
00515         /* particle systems */
00516         if (obt->particlesystem.first) {
00517             ParticleSystem *tpsys= obt->particlesystem.first;
00518             for (; tpsys; tpsys=tpsys->next) {
00519                 BoidState *state = NULL;
00520                 BoidRule *rule = NULL;
00521 
00522                 ParticleTarget *pt = tpsys->targets.first;
00523                 for (; pt; pt=pt->next) {
00524                     if (pt->ob==ob) {
00525                         pt->ob = NULL;
00526                         obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
00527                         break;
00528                     }
00529                 }
00530 
00531                 if (tpsys->target_ob==ob) {
00532                     tpsys->target_ob= NULL;
00533                     obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
00534                 }
00535 
00536                 if (tpsys->part->dup_ob==ob)
00537                     tpsys->part->dup_ob= NULL;
00538 
00539                 if (tpsys->part->phystype==PART_PHYS_BOIDS) {
00540                     ParticleData *pa;
00541                     BoidParticle *bpa;
00542                     int p;
00543 
00544                     for (p=0,pa=tpsys->particles; p<tpsys->totpart; p++,pa++) {
00545                         bpa = pa->boid;
00546                         if (bpa->ground == ob)
00547                             bpa->ground = NULL;
00548                     }
00549                 }
00550                 if (tpsys->part->boids) {
00551                     for (state = tpsys->part->boids->states.first; state; state=state->next) {
00552                         for (rule = state->rules.first; rule; rule=rule->next) {
00553                             if (rule->type==eBoidRuleType_Avoid) {
00554                                 BoidRuleGoalAvoid *gabr = (BoidRuleGoalAvoid*)rule;
00555                                 if (gabr->ob==ob)
00556                                     gabr->ob= NULL;
00557                             }
00558                             else if (rule->type==eBoidRuleType_FollowLeader) {
00559                                 BoidRuleFollowLeader *flbr = (BoidRuleFollowLeader*)rule;
00560                                 if (flbr->ob==ob)
00561                                     flbr->ob= NULL;
00562                             }
00563                         }
00564                     }
00565                 }
00566             }
00567             if (ob->pd)
00568                 obt->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
00569         }
00570 
00571         obt= obt->id.next;
00572     }
00573     
00574     /* materials */
00575     mat= bmain->mat.first;
00576     while (mat) {
00577     
00578         for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00579             if (mat->mtex[a] && ob==mat->mtex[a]->object) {
00580                 /* actually, test for lib here... to do */
00581                 mat->mtex[a]->object= NULL;
00582             }
00583         }
00584 
00585         mat= mat->id.next;
00586     }
00587     
00588     /* textures */
00589     for (tex= bmain->tex.first; tex; tex= tex->id.next) {
00590         if (tex->env && (ob==tex->env->object)) tex->env->object= NULL;
00591         if (tex->pd  && (ob==tex->pd->object))  tex->pd->object= NULL;
00592         if (tex->vd  && (ob==tex->vd->object))  tex->vd->object= NULL;
00593     }
00594 
00595     /* worlds */
00596     wrld= bmain->world.first;
00597     while (wrld) {
00598         if (wrld->id.lib==NULL) {
00599             for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00600                 if (wrld->mtex[a] && ob==wrld->mtex[a]->object)
00601                     wrld->mtex[a]->object= NULL;
00602             }
00603         }
00604         
00605         wrld= wrld->id.next;
00606     }
00607         
00608     /* scenes */
00609     sce= bmain->scene.first;
00610     while (sce) {
00611         if (sce->id.lib==NULL) {
00612             if (sce->camera==ob) sce->camera= NULL;
00613             if (sce->toolsettings->skgen_template==ob) sce->toolsettings->skgen_template = NULL;
00614             if (sce->toolsettings->particle.object==ob) sce->toolsettings->particle.object= NULL;
00615 
00616 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
00617             {
00618                 TimeMarker *m;
00619 
00620                 for (m= sce->markers.first; m; m= m->next) {
00621                     if (m->camera==ob)
00622                         m->camera= NULL;
00623                 }
00624             }
00625 #endif
00626             if (sce->ed) {
00627                 Sequence *seq;
00628                 SEQ_BEGIN(sce->ed, seq)
00629                     if (seq->scene_camera==ob) {
00630                         seq->scene_camera= NULL;
00631                     }
00632                 SEQ_END
00633             }
00634         }
00635 
00636         sce= sce->id.next;
00637     }
00638     
00639     /* screens */
00640     sc= bmain->screen.first;
00641     while (sc) {
00642         ScrArea *sa= sc->areabase.first;
00643         while (sa) {
00644             SpaceLink *sl;
00645 
00646             for (sl= sa->spacedata.first; sl; sl= sl->next) {
00647                 if (sl->spacetype==SPACE_VIEW3D) {
00648                     View3D *v3d= (View3D*) sl;
00649 
00650                     /* found doesn't need to be set here */
00651                     if (v3d->ob_centre == ob) {
00652                         v3d->ob_centre = NULL;
00653                         v3d->ob_centre_bone[0] = '\0';
00654                     }
00655                     if (v3d->localvd && v3d->localvd->ob_centre == ob) {
00656                         v3d->localvd->ob_centre = NULL;
00657                         v3d->localvd->ob_centre_bone[0] = '\0';
00658                     }
00659 
00660                     found= 0;
00661                     if (v3d->camera==ob) {
00662                         v3d->camera= NULL;
00663                         found= 1;
00664                     }
00665                     if (v3d->localvd && v3d->localvd->camera==ob ) {
00666                         v3d->localvd->camera= NULL;
00667                         found += 2;
00668                     }
00669 
00670                     if (found) {
00671                         if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D) {
00672                             for (ar= sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar= ar->next) {
00673                                 if (ar->regiontype==RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00674                                     rv3d= (RegionView3D *)ar->regiondata;
00675                                     if (found == 1 || found == 3) {
00676                                         if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB)
00677                                             rv3d->persp= RV3D_PERSP;
00678                                     }
00679                                     if (found == 2 || found == 3) {
00680                                         if (rv3d->localvd && rv3d->localvd->persp == RV3D_CAMOB)
00681                                             rv3d->localvd->persp= RV3D_PERSP;
00682                                     }
00683                                 }
00684                             }
00685                         }
00686                     }
00687                 }
00688                 else if (sl->spacetype==SPACE_OUTLINER) {
00689                     SpaceOops *so= (SpaceOops *)sl;
00690 
00691                     if (so->treestore) {
00692                         TreeStoreElem *tselem= so->treestore->data;
00693                         int a;
00694                         for (a=0; a<so->treestore->usedelem; a++, tselem++) {
00695                             if (tselem->id==(ID *)ob) tselem->id= NULL;
00696                         }
00697                     }
00698                 }
00699                 else if (sl->spacetype==SPACE_BUTS) {
00700                     SpaceButs *sbuts= (SpaceButs *)sl;
00701 
00702                     if (sbuts->pinid==(ID *)ob) {
00703                         sbuts->flag&= ~SB_PIN_CONTEXT;
00704                         sbuts->pinid= NULL;
00705                     }
00706                 }
00707             }
00708 
00709             sa= sa->next;
00710         }
00711         sc= sc->id.next;
00712     }
00713 
00714     /* groups */
00715     group= bmain->group.first;
00716     while (group) {
00717         rem_from_group(group, ob, NULL, NULL);
00718         group= group->id.next;
00719     }
00720     
00721     /* cameras */
00722     camera= bmain->camera.first;
00723     while (camera) {
00724         if (camera->dof_ob==ob) {
00725             camera->dof_ob = NULL;
00726         }
00727         camera= camera->id.next;
00728     }
00729 }
00730 
00731 int exist_object(Object *obtest)
00732 {
00733     Object *ob;
00734     
00735     if (obtest==NULL) return 0;
00736     
00737     ob= G.main->object.first;
00738     while (ob) {
00739         if (ob==obtest) return 1;
00740         ob= ob->id.next;
00741     }
00742     return 0;
00743 }
00744 
00745 /* *************************************************** */
00746 
00747 static void *add_obdata_from_type(int type)
00748 {
00749     switch (type) {
00750     case OB_MESH: return add_mesh("Mesh");
00751     case OB_CURVE: return add_curve("Curve", OB_CURVE);
00752     case OB_SURF: return add_curve("Surf", OB_SURF);
00753     case OB_FONT: return add_curve("Text", OB_FONT);
00754     case OB_MBALL: return add_mball("Meta");
00755     case OB_CAMERA: return add_camera("Camera");
00756     case OB_LAMP: return add_lamp("Lamp");
00757     case OB_LATTICE: return add_lattice("Lattice");
00758     case OB_ARMATURE: return add_armature("Armature");
00759     case OB_SPEAKER: return add_speaker("Speaker");
00760     case OB_EMPTY: return NULL;
00761     default:
00762         printf("add_obdata_from_type: Internal error, bad type: %d\n", type);
00763         return NULL;
00764     }
00765 }
00766 
00767 static const char *get_obdata_defname(int type)
00768 {
00769     switch (type) {
00770     case OB_MESH: return "Mesh";
00771     case OB_CURVE: return "Curve";
00772     case OB_SURF: return "Surf";
00773     case OB_FONT: return "Text";
00774     case OB_MBALL: return "Mball";
00775     case OB_CAMERA: return "Camera";
00776     case OB_LAMP: return "Lamp";
00777     case OB_LATTICE: return "Lattice";
00778     case OB_ARMATURE: return "Armature";
00779     case OB_SPEAKER: return "Speaker";
00780     case OB_EMPTY: return "Empty";
00781     default:
00782         printf("get_obdata_defname: Internal error, bad type: %d\n", type);
00783         return "Empty";
00784     }
00785 }
00786 
00787 /* more general add: creates minimum required data, but without vertices etc. */
00788 Object *add_only_object(int type, const char *name)
00789 {
00790     Object *ob;
00791 
00792     ob= alloc_libblock(&G.main->object, ID_OB, name);
00793 
00794     /* default object vars */
00795     ob->type= type;
00796     
00797     ob->col[0]= ob->col[1]= ob->col[2]= 1.0;
00798     ob->col[3]= 1.0;
00799     
00800     ob->size[0]= ob->size[1]= ob->size[2]= 1.0;
00801     ob->dscale[0]= ob->dscale[1]= ob->dscale[2]= 1.0;
00802     
00803     /* objects should default to having Euler XYZ rotations, 
00804      * but rotations default to quaternions 
00805      */
00806     ob->rotmode= ROT_MODE_EUL;
00807 
00808     unit_axis_angle(ob->rotAxis, &ob->rotAngle);
00809     unit_axis_angle(ob->drotAxis, &ob->drotAngle);
00810 
00811     unit_qt(ob->quat);
00812     unit_qt(ob->dquat);
00813 
00814     /* rotation locks should be 4D for 4 component rotations by default... */
00815     ob->protectflag = OB_LOCK_ROT4D;
00816     
00817     unit_m4(ob->constinv);
00818     unit_m4(ob->parentinv);
00819     unit_m4(ob->obmat);
00820     ob->dt= OB_TEXTURE;
00821     ob->empty_drawtype= OB_PLAINAXES;
00822     ob->empty_drawsize= 1.0;
00823 
00824     if (type==OB_CAMERA || type==OB_LAMP || type==OB_SPEAKER) {
00825         ob->trackflag= OB_NEGZ;
00826         ob->upflag= OB_POSY;
00827     }
00828     else {
00829         ob->trackflag= OB_POSY;
00830         ob->upflag= OB_POSZ;
00831     }
00832     
00833     ob->dupon= 1; ob->dupoff= 0;
00834     ob->dupsta= 1; ob->dupend= 100;
00835     ob->dupfacesca = 1.0;
00836 
00837     /* Game engine defaults*/
00838     ob->mass= ob->inertia= 1.0f;
00839     ob->formfactor= 0.4f;
00840     ob->damping= 0.04f;
00841     ob->rdamping= 0.1f;
00842     ob->anisotropicFriction[0] = 1.0f;
00843     ob->anisotropicFriction[1] = 1.0f;
00844     ob->anisotropicFriction[2] = 1.0f;
00845     ob->gameflag= OB_PROP|OB_COLLISION;
00846     ob->margin = 0.0;
00847     ob->init_state=1;
00848     ob->state=1;
00849     /* ob->pad3 == Contact Processing Threshold */
00850     ob->m_contactProcessingThreshold = 1.0f;
00851     ob->obstacleRad = 1.0f;
00852     
00853     /* NT fluid sim defaults */
00854     ob->fluidsimSettings = NULL;
00855 
00856     ob->pc_ids.first = ob->pc_ids.last = NULL;
00857     
00858     /* Animation Visualisation defaults */
00859     animviz_settings_init(&ob->avs);
00860 
00861     return ob;
00862 }
00863 
00864 /* general add: to scene, with layer from area and default name */
00865 /* creates minimum required data, but without vertices etc. */
00866 Object *add_object(struct Scene *scene, int type)
00867 {
00868     Object *ob;
00869     Base *base;
00870     char name[MAX_ID_NAME];
00871 
00872     BLI_strncpy(name, get_obdata_defname(type), sizeof(name));
00873     ob = add_only_object(type, name);
00874 
00875     ob->data= add_obdata_from_type(type);
00876 
00877     ob->lay= scene->lay;
00878     
00879     base= scene_add_base(scene, ob);
00880     scene_select_base(scene, base);
00881     ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
00882 
00883     return ob;
00884 }
00885 
00886 SoftBody *copy_softbody(SoftBody *sb)
00887 {
00888     SoftBody *sbn;
00889     
00890     if (sb==NULL) return(NULL);
00891     
00892     sbn= MEM_dupallocN(sb);
00893     sbn->totspring= sbn->totpoint= 0;
00894     sbn->bpoint= NULL;
00895     sbn->bspring= NULL;
00896     
00897     sbn->keys= NULL;
00898     sbn->totkey= sbn->totpointkey= 0;
00899     
00900     sbn->scratch= NULL;
00901 
00902     sbn->pointcache= BKE_ptcache_copy_list(&sbn->ptcaches, &sb->ptcaches);
00903 
00904     if (sb->effector_weights)
00905         sbn->effector_weights = MEM_dupallocN(sb->effector_weights);
00906 
00907     return sbn;
00908 }
00909 
00910 BulletSoftBody *copy_bulletsoftbody(BulletSoftBody *bsb)
00911 {
00912     BulletSoftBody *bsbn;
00913 
00914     if (bsb == NULL)
00915         return NULL;
00916     bsbn = MEM_dupallocN(bsb);
00917     /* no pointer in this structure yet */
00918     return bsbn;
00919 }
00920 
00921 static ParticleSystem *copy_particlesystem(ParticleSystem *psys)
00922 {
00923     ParticleSystem *psysn;
00924     ParticleData *pa;
00925     int p;
00926 
00927     psysn= MEM_dupallocN(psys);
00928     psysn->particles= MEM_dupallocN(psys->particles);
00929     psysn->child= MEM_dupallocN(psys->child);
00930 
00931     if (psys->part->type == PART_HAIR) {
00932         for (p=0, pa=psysn->particles; p<psysn->totpart; p++, pa++)
00933             pa->hair = MEM_dupallocN(pa->hair);
00934     }
00935 
00936     if (psysn->particles && (psysn->particles->keys || psysn->particles->boid)) {
00937         ParticleKey *key = psysn->particles->keys;
00938         BoidParticle *boid = psysn->particles->boid;
00939 
00940         if (key)
00941             key = MEM_dupallocN(key);
00942         
00943         if (boid)
00944             boid = MEM_dupallocN(boid);
00945         
00946         for (p=0, pa=psysn->particles; p<psysn->totpart; p++, pa++) {
00947             if (boid)
00948                 pa->boid = boid++;
00949             if (key) {
00950                 pa->keys = key;
00951                 key += pa->totkey;
00952             }
00953         }
00954     }
00955 
00956     if (psys->clmd) {
00957         psysn->clmd = (ClothModifierData *)modifier_new(eModifierType_Cloth);
00958         modifier_copyData((ModifierData*)psys->clmd, (ModifierData*)psysn->clmd);
00959         psys->hair_in_dm = psys->hair_out_dm = NULL;
00960     }
00961 
00962     BLI_duplicatelist(&psysn->targets, &psys->targets);
00963 
00964     psysn->pathcache= NULL;
00965     psysn->childcache= NULL;
00966     psysn->edit= NULL;
00967     psysn->frand= NULL;
00968     psysn->pdd= NULL;
00969     psysn->effectors= NULL;
00970     
00971     psysn->pathcachebufs.first = psysn->pathcachebufs.last = NULL;
00972     psysn->childcachebufs.first = psysn->childcachebufs.last = NULL;
00973     psysn->renderdata = NULL;
00974     
00975     psysn->pointcache= BKE_ptcache_copy_list(&psysn->ptcaches, &psys->ptcaches);
00976 
00977     /* XXX - from reading existing code this seems correct but intended usage of
00978      * pointcache should /w cloth should be added in 'ParticleSystem' - campbell */
00979     if (psysn->clmd) {
00980         psysn->clmd->point_cache= psysn->pointcache;
00981     }
00982 
00983     id_us_plus((ID *)psysn->part);
00984 
00985     return psysn;
00986 }
00987 
00988 void copy_object_particlesystems(Object *obn, Object *ob)
00989 {
00990     ParticleSystem *psys, *npsys;
00991     ModifierData *md;
00992 
00993     if (obn->type != OB_MESH) {
00994         /* currently only mesh objects can have soft body */
00995         return;
00996     }
00997 
00998     obn->particlesystem.first= obn->particlesystem.last= NULL;
00999     for (psys=ob->particlesystem.first; psys; psys=psys->next) {
01000         npsys= copy_particlesystem(psys);
01001 
01002         BLI_addtail(&obn->particlesystem, npsys);
01003 
01004         /* need to update particle modifiers too */
01005         for (md=obn->modifiers.first; md; md=md->next) {
01006             if (md->type==eModifierType_ParticleSystem) {
01007                 ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd= (ParticleSystemModifierData*)md;
01008                 if (psmd->psys==psys)
01009                     psmd->psys= npsys;
01010             }
01011             else if (md->type==eModifierType_DynamicPaint) {
01012                 DynamicPaintModifierData *pmd= (DynamicPaintModifierData*)md;
01013                 if (pmd->brush) {
01014                     if (pmd->brush->psys==psys) {
01015                         pmd->brush->psys= npsys;
01016                     }
01017                 }
01018             }
01019             else if (md->type==eModifierType_Smoke) {
01020                 SmokeModifierData *smd = (SmokeModifierData*) md;
01021                 
01022                 if (smd->type==MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_FLOW) {
01023                     if (smd->flow) {
01024                         if (smd->flow->psys == psys)
01025                             smd->flow->psys= npsys;
01026                     }
01027                 }
01028             }
01029         }
01030     }
01031 }
01032 
01033 void copy_object_softbody(Object *obn, Object *ob)
01034 {
01035     if (ob->soft)
01036         obn->soft= copy_softbody(ob->soft);
01037 }
01038 
01039 static void copy_object_pose(Object *obn, Object *ob)
01040 {
01041     bPoseChannel *chan;
01042     
01043     /* note: need to clear obn->pose pointer first, so that copy_pose works (otherwise there's a crash) */
01044     obn->pose= NULL;
01045     copy_pose(&obn->pose, ob->pose, 1); /* 1 = copy constraints */
01046 
01047     for (chan = obn->pose->chanbase.first; chan; chan=chan->next) {
01048         bConstraint *con;
01049         
01050         chan->flag &= ~(POSE_LOC|POSE_ROT|POSE_SIZE);
01051         
01052         for (con= chan->constraints.first; con; con= con->next) {
01053             bConstraintTypeInfo *cti= constraint_get_typeinfo(con);
01054             ListBase targets = {NULL, NULL};
01055             bConstraintTarget *ct;
01056             
01057             if (cti && cti->get_constraint_targets) {
01058                 cti->get_constraint_targets(con, &targets);
01059                 
01060                 for (ct= targets.first; ct; ct= ct->next) {
01061                     if (ct->tar == ob)
01062                         ct->tar = obn;
01063                 }
01064                 
01065                 if (cti->flush_constraint_targets)
01066                     cti->flush_constraint_targets(con, &targets, 0);
01067             }
01068         }
01069     }
01070 }
01071 
01072 static int object_pose_context(Object *ob)
01073 {
01074     if (    (ob) &&
01075         (ob->type == OB_ARMATURE) &&
01076         (ob->pose) &&
01077         (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)
01078     ) {
01079         return 1;
01080     }
01081     else {
01082         return 0;
01083     }
01084 }
01085 
01086 Object *object_pose_armature_get(Object *ob)
01087 {
01088     if (ob==NULL)
01089         return NULL;
01090 
01091     if (object_pose_context(ob))
01092         return ob;
01093 
01094     ob= modifiers_isDeformedByArmature(ob);
01095 
01096     if (object_pose_context(ob))
01097         return ob;
01098 
01099     return NULL;
01100 }
01101 
01102 static void copy_object_transform(Object *ob_tar, Object *ob_src)
01103 {
01104     copy_v3_v3(ob_tar->loc, ob_src->loc);
01105     copy_v3_v3(ob_tar->rot, ob_src->rot);
01106     copy_v3_v3(ob_tar->quat, ob_src->quat);
01107     copy_v3_v3(ob_tar->rotAxis, ob_src->rotAxis);
01108     ob_tar->rotAngle= ob_src->rotAngle;
01109     ob_tar->rotmode= ob_src->rotmode;
01110     copy_v3_v3(ob_tar->size, ob_src->size);
01111 }
01112 
01113 Object *copy_object(Object *ob)
01114 {
01115     Object *obn;
01116     ModifierData *md;
01117     int a;
01118 
01119     obn= copy_libblock(&ob->id);
01120     
01121     if (ob->totcol) {
01122         obn->mat= MEM_dupallocN(ob->mat);
01123         obn->matbits= MEM_dupallocN(ob->matbits);
01124         obn->totcol= ob->totcol;
01125     }
01126     
01127     if (ob->bb) obn->bb= MEM_dupallocN(ob->bb);
01128     obn->flag &= ~OB_FROMGROUP;
01129     
01130     obn->modifiers.first = obn->modifiers.last= NULL;
01131     
01132     for (md=ob->modifiers.first; md; md=md->next) {
01133         ModifierData *nmd = modifier_new(md->type);
01134         BLI_strncpy(nmd->name, md->name, sizeof(nmd->name));
01135         modifier_copyData(md, nmd);
01136         BLI_addtail(&obn->modifiers, nmd);
01137     }
01138 
01139     obn->prop.first = obn->prop.last = NULL;
01140     copy_properties(&obn->prop, &ob->prop);
01141     
01142     copy_sensors(&obn->sensors, &ob->sensors);
01143     copy_controllers(&obn->controllers, &ob->controllers);
01144     copy_actuators(&obn->actuators, &ob->actuators);
01145     
01146     if (ob->pose) {
01147         copy_object_pose(obn, ob);
01148         /* backwards compat... non-armatures can get poses in older files? */
01149         if (ob->type==OB_ARMATURE)
01150             armature_rebuild_pose(obn, obn->data);
01151     }
01152     defgroup_copy_list(&obn->defbase, &ob->defbase);
01153     copy_constraints(&obn->constraints, &ob->constraints, TRUE);
01154 
01155     obn->mode = 0;
01156     obn->sculpt = NULL;
01157 
01158     /* increase user numbers */
01159     id_us_plus((ID *)obn->data);
01160     id_us_plus((ID *)obn->gpd);
01161     id_lib_extern((ID *)obn->dup_group);
01162 
01163     for (a=0; a<obn->totcol; a++) id_us_plus((ID *)obn->mat[a]);
01164     
01165     obn->disp.first= obn->disp.last= NULL;
01166     
01167     if (ob->pd) {
01168         obn->pd= MEM_dupallocN(ob->pd);
01169         if (obn->pd->tex)
01170             id_us_plus(&(obn->pd->tex->id));
01171         if (obn->pd->rng)
01172             obn->pd->rng = MEM_dupallocN(ob->pd->rng);
01173     }
01174     obn->soft= copy_softbody(ob->soft);
01175     obn->bsoft = copy_bulletsoftbody(ob->bsoft);
01176 
01177     copy_object_particlesystems(obn, ob);
01178     
01179     obn->derivedDeform = NULL;
01180     obn->derivedFinal = NULL;
01181 
01182     obn->gpulamp.first = obn->gpulamp.last = NULL;
01183     obn->pc_ids.first = obn->pc_ids.last = NULL;
01184 
01185     obn->mpath= NULL;
01186     
01187     return obn;
01188 }
01189 
01190 static void extern_local_object(Object *ob)
01191 {
01192     ParticleSystem *psys;
01193 
01194     id_lib_extern((ID *)ob->data);
01195     id_lib_extern((ID *)ob->dup_group);
01196     id_lib_extern((ID *)ob->poselib);
01197     id_lib_extern((ID *)ob->gpd);
01198 
01199     extern_local_matarar(ob->mat, ob->totcol);
01200 
01201     for (psys=ob->particlesystem.first; psys; psys=psys->next)
01202         id_lib_extern((ID *)psys->part);
01203 }
01204 
01205 void make_local_object(Object *ob)
01206 {
01207     Main *bmain= G.main;
01208     Scene *sce;
01209     Base *base;
01210     int is_local= FALSE, is_lib= FALSE;
01211 
01212     /* - only lib users: do nothing
01213      * - only local users: set flag
01214      * - mixed: make copy
01215      */
01216 
01217     if (ob->id.lib==NULL) return;
01218     
01219     ob->proxy= ob->proxy_from= NULL;
01220     
01221     if (ob->id.us==1) {
01222         id_clear_lib_data(bmain, &ob->id);
01223         extern_local_object(ob);
01224     }
01225     else {
01226         for (sce= bmain->scene.first; sce && ELEM(0, is_lib, is_local); sce= sce->id.next) {
01227             if (object_in_scene(ob, sce)) {
01228                 if (sce->id.lib) is_lib= TRUE;
01229                 else is_local= TRUE;
01230             }
01231         }
01232 
01233         if (is_local && is_lib == FALSE) {
01234             id_clear_lib_data(bmain, &ob->id);
01235             extern_local_object(ob);
01236         }
01237         else if (is_local && is_lib) {
01238             Object *ob_new= copy_object(ob);
01239 
01240             ob_new->id.us= 0;
01241             
01242             /* Remap paths of new ID using old library as base. */
01243             BKE_id_lib_local_paths(bmain, ob->id.lib, &ob_new->id);
01244 
01245             sce= bmain->scene.first;
01246             while (sce) {
01247                 if (sce->id.lib==NULL) {
01248                     base= sce->base.first;
01249                     while (base) {
01250                         if (base->object==ob) {
01251                             base->object= ob_new;
01252                             ob_new->id.us++;
01253                             ob->id.us--;
01254                         }
01255                         base= base->next;
01256                     }
01257                 }
01258                 sce= sce->id.next;
01259             }
01260         }
01261     }
01262 }
01263 
01264 /*
01265  * Returns true if the Object is a from an external blend file (libdata)
01266  */
01267 int object_is_libdata(Object *ob)
01268 {
01269     if (!ob) return 0;
01270     if (ob->proxy) return 0;
01271     if (ob->id.lib) return 1;
01272     return 0;
01273 }
01274 
01275 /* Returns true if the Object data is a from an external blend file (libdata) */
01276 int object_data_is_libdata(Object *ob)
01277 {
01278     if (!ob) return 0;
01279     if (ob->proxy && (ob->data==NULL || ((ID *)ob->data)->lib==NULL)) return 0;
01280     if (ob->id.lib) return 1;
01281     if (ob->data==NULL) return 0;
01282     if (((ID *)ob->data)->lib) return 1;
01283 
01284     return 0;
01285 }
01286 
01287 /* *************** PROXY **************** */
01288 
01289 /* when you make proxy, ensure the exposed layers are extern */
01290 static void armature_set_id_extern(Object *ob)
01291 {
01292     bArmature *arm= ob->data;
01293     bPoseChannel *pchan;
01294     unsigned int lay= arm->layer_protected;
01295     
01296     for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan=pchan->next) {
01297         if (!(pchan->bone->layer & lay))
01298             id_lib_extern((ID *)pchan->custom);
01299     }
01300             
01301 }
01302 
01303 void object_copy_proxy_drivers(Object *ob, Object *target)
01304 {
01305     if ((target->adt) && (target->adt->drivers.first)) {
01306         FCurve *fcu;
01307         
01308         /* add new animdata block */
01309         if (!ob->adt)
01310             ob->adt= BKE_id_add_animdata(&ob->id);
01311         
01312         /* make a copy of all the drivers (for now), then correct any links that need fixing */
01313         free_fcurves(&ob->adt->drivers);
01314         copy_fcurves(&ob->adt->drivers, &target->adt->drivers);
01315         
01316         for (fcu= ob->adt->drivers.first; fcu; fcu= fcu->next) {
01317             ChannelDriver *driver= fcu->driver;
01318             DriverVar *dvar;
01319             
01320             for (dvar= driver->variables.first; dvar; dvar= dvar->next) {
01321                 /* all drivers */
01322                 DRIVER_TARGETS_LOOPER(dvar) 
01323                 {
01324                     if (dtar->id) {
01325                         if ((Object *)dtar->id == target)
01326                             dtar->id= (ID *)ob;
01327                         else {
01328                             /* only on local objects because this causes indirect links a -> b -> c,blend to point directly to a.blend
01329                              * when a.blend has a proxy thats linked into c.blend  */
01330                             if (ob->id.lib==NULL)
01331                                 id_lib_extern((ID *)dtar->id);
01332                         }
01333                     }
01334                 }
01335                 DRIVER_TARGETS_LOOPER_END
01336             }
01337         }
01338     }
01339 }
01340 
01341 /* proxy rule: lib_object->proxy_from == the one we borrow from, set temporally while object_update */
01342 /*             local_object->proxy == pointer to library object, saved in files and read */
01343 /*             local_object->proxy_group == pointer to group dupli-object, saved in files and read */
01344 
01345 void object_make_proxy(Object *ob, Object *target, Object *gob)
01346 {
01347     /* paranoia checks */
01348     if (ob->id.lib || target->id.lib==NULL) {
01349         printf("cannot make proxy\n");
01350         return;
01351     }
01352     
01353     ob->proxy= target;
01354     ob->proxy_group= gob;
01355     id_lib_extern(&target->id);
01356     
01357     ob->recalc= target->recalc= OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME;
01358     
01359     /* copy transform
01360      * - gob means this proxy comes from a group, just apply the matrix
01361      *   so the object wont move from its dupli-transform.
01362      *
01363      * - no gob means this is being made from a linked object,
01364      *   this is closer to making a copy of the object - in-place. */
01365     if (gob) {
01366         ob->rotmode= target->rotmode;
01367         mult_m4_m4m4(ob->obmat, gob->obmat, target->obmat);
01368         if (gob->dup_group) { /* should always be true */
01369             float tvec[3];
01370             copy_v3_v3(tvec, gob->dup_group->dupli_ofs);
01371             mul_mat3_m4_v3(ob->obmat, tvec);
01372             sub_v3_v3(ob->obmat[3], tvec);
01373         }
01374         object_apply_mat4(ob, ob->obmat, FALSE, TRUE);
01375     }
01376     else {
01377         copy_object_transform(ob, target);
01378         ob->parent= target->parent; /* libdata */
01379         copy_m4_m4(ob->parentinv, target->parentinv);
01380     }
01381     
01382     /* copy animdata stuff - drivers only for now... */
01383     object_copy_proxy_drivers(ob, target);
01384 
01385     /* skip constraints? */
01386     // FIXME: this is considered by many as a bug
01387     
01388     /* set object type and link to data */
01389     ob->type= target->type;
01390     ob->data= target->data;
01391     id_us_plus((ID *)ob->data);     /* ensures lib data becomes LIB_EXTERN */
01392     
01393     /* copy material and index information */
01394     ob->actcol= ob->totcol= 0;
01395     if (ob->mat) MEM_freeN(ob->mat);
01396     if (ob->matbits) MEM_freeN(ob->matbits);
01397     ob->mat = NULL;
01398     ob->matbits= NULL;
01399     if ((target->totcol) && (target->mat) && OB_TYPE_SUPPORT_MATERIAL(ob->type)) {
01400         int i;
01401         
01402         ob->actcol= target->actcol;
01403         ob->totcol= target->totcol;
01404         
01405         ob->mat = MEM_dupallocN(target->mat);
01406         ob->matbits = MEM_dupallocN(target->matbits);
01407         for (i=0; i<target->totcol; i++) {
01408             /* don't need to run test_object_materials since we know this object is new and not used elsewhere */
01409             id_us_plus((ID *)ob->mat[i]); 
01410         }
01411     }
01412     
01413     /* type conversions */
01414     if (target->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
01415         copy_object_pose(ob, target);   /* data copy, object pointers in constraints */
01416         rest_pose(ob->pose);            /* clear all transforms in channels */
01417         armature_rebuild_pose(ob, ob->data);    /* set all internal links */
01418         
01419         armature_set_id_extern(ob);
01420     }
01421     else if (target->type == OB_EMPTY) {
01422         ob->empty_drawtype = target->empty_drawtype;
01423         ob->empty_drawsize = target->empty_drawsize;
01424     }
01425 
01426     /* copy IDProperties */
01427     if (ob->id.properties) {
01428         IDP_FreeProperty(ob->id.properties);
01429         MEM_freeN(ob->id.properties);
01430         ob->id.properties= NULL;
01431     }
01432     if (target->id.properties) {
01433         ob->id.properties= IDP_CopyProperty(target->id.properties);
01434     }
01435 
01436     /* copy drawtype info */
01437     ob->dt= target->dt;
01438 }
01439 
01440 
01441 /* *************** CALC ****************** */
01442 
01443 void object_scale_to_mat3(Object *ob, float mat[][3])
01444 {
01445     float vec[3];
01446     mul_v3_v3v3(vec, ob->size, ob->dscale);
01447     size_to_mat3( mat,vec);
01448 }
01449 
01450 void object_rot_to_mat3(Object *ob, float mat[][3])
01451 {
01452     float rmat[3][3], dmat[3][3];
01453     
01454     /* 'dmat' is the delta-rotation matrix, which will get (pre)multiplied
01455      * with the rotation matrix to yield the appropriate rotation
01456      */
01457 
01458     /* rotations may either be quats, eulers (with various rotation orders), or axis-angle */
01459     if (ob->rotmode > 0) {
01460         /* euler rotations (will cause gimble lock, but this can be alleviated a bit with rotation orders) */
01461         eulO_to_mat3(rmat, ob->rot, ob->rotmode);
01462         eulO_to_mat3(dmat, ob->drot, ob->rotmode);
01463     }
01464     else if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
01465         /* axis-angle -  not really that great for 3D-changing orientations */
01466         axis_angle_to_mat3(rmat, ob->rotAxis, ob->rotAngle);
01467         axis_angle_to_mat3(dmat, ob->drotAxis, ob->drotAngle);
01468     }
01469     else {
01470         /* quats are normalised before use to eliminate scaling issues */
01471         float tquat[4];
01472         
01473         normalize_qt_qt(tquat, ob->quat);
01474         quat_to_mat3(rmat, tquat);
01475         
01476         normalize_qt_qt(tquat, ob->dquat);
01477         quat_to_mat3(dmat, tquat);
01478     }
01479     
01480     /* combine these rotations */
01481     mul_m3_m3m3(mat, dmat, rmat);
01482 }
01483 
01484 void object_mat3_to_rot(Object *ob, float mat[][3], short use_compat)
01485 {
01486     switch(ob->rotmode) {
01487     case ROT_MODE_QUAT:
01488         {
01489             float dquat[4];
01490             mat3_to_quat(ob->quat, mat);
01491             normalize_qt_qt(dquat, ob->dquat);
01492             invert_qt(dquat);
01493             mul_qt_qtqt(ob->quat, dquat, ob->quat);
01494         }
01495         break;
01496     case ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE:
01497         mat3_to_axis_angle(ob->rotAxis, &ob->rotAngle, mat);
01498         sub_v3_v3(ob->rotAxis, ob->drotAxis);
01499         ob->rotAngle -= ob->drotAngle;
01500         break;
01501     default: /* euler */
01502         {
01503             float quat[4];
01504             float dquat[4];
01505             float tmat[3][3];
01506 
01507             /* without drot we could apply 'mat' directly */
01508             mat3_to_quat(quat, mat);
01509             eulO_to_quat(dquat, ob->drot, ob->rotmode);
01510             invert_qt(dquat);
01511             mul_qt_qtqt(quat, dquat, quat);
01512             quat_to_mat3(tmat, quat);
01513             /* end drot correction */
01514 
01515             if (use_compat) mat3_to_compatible_eulO(ob->rot, ob->rot, ob->rotmode, tmat);
01516             else            mat3_to_eulO(ob->rot, ob->rotmode, tmat);
01517         }
01518     }
01519 }
01520 
01521 void object_tfm_protected_backup(const Object *ob,
01522                                  ObjectTfmProtectedChannels *obtfm)
01523 {
01524 
01525 #define TFMCPY(   _v) (obtfm->_v = ob->_v)
01526 #define TFMCPY3D( _v) copy_v3_v3(obtfm->_v, ob->_v)
01527 #define TFMCPY4D( _v) copy_v4_v4(obtfm->_v, ob->_v)
01528 
01529     TFMCPY3D(loc);
01530     TFMCPY3D(dloc);
01531     TFMCPY3D(size);
01532     TFMCPY3D(dscale);
01533     TFMCPY3D(rot);
01534     TFMCPY3D(drot);
01535     TFMCPY4D(quat);
01536     TFMCPY4D(dquat);
01537     TFMCPY3D(rotAxis);
01538     TFMCPY3D(drotAxis);
01539     TFMCPY(rotAngle);
01540     TFMCPY(drotAngle);
01541 
01542 #undef TFMCPY
01543 #undef TFMCPY3D
01544 #undef TFMCPY4D
01545 
01546 }
01547 
01548 void object_tfm_protected_restore(Object *ob,
01549                                   const ObjectTfmProtectedChannels *obtfm,
01550                                   const short protectflag)
01551 {
01552     unsigned int i;
01553 
01554     for (i= 0; i < 3; i++) {
01555         if (protectflag & (OB_LOCK_LOCX<<i)) {
01556             ob->loc[i]=  obtfm->loc[i];
01557             ob->dloc[i]= obtfm->dloc[i];
01558         }
01559 
01560         if (protectflag & (OB_LOCK_SCALEX<<i)) {
01561             ob->size[i]=  obtfm->size[i];
01562             ob->dscale[i]= obtfm->dscale[i];
01563         }
01564 
01565         if (protectflag & (OB_LOCK_ROTX<<i)) {
01566             ob->rot[i]=  obtfm->rot[i];
01567             ob->drot[i]= obtfm->drot[i];
01568 
01569             ob->quat[i + 1]=  obtfm->quat[i + 1];
01570             ob->dquat[i + 1]= obtfm->dquat[i + 1];
01571 
01572             ob->rotAxis[i]=  obtfm->rotAxis[i];
01573             ob->drotAxis[i]= obtfm->drotAxis[i];
01574         }
01575     }
01576 
01577     if ((protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROT4D) && (protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTW)) {
01578         ob->quat[0]=  obtfm->quat[0];
01579         ob->dquat[0]= obtfm->dquat[0];
01580 
01581         ob->rotAngle=  obtfm->rotAngle;
01582         ob->drotAngle= obtfm->drotAngle;
01583     }
01584 }
01585 
01586 /* see pchan_apply_mat4() for the equivalent 'pchan' function */
01587 void object_apply_mat4(Object *ob, float mat[][4], const short use_compat, const short use_parent)
01588 {
01589     float rot[3][3];
01590 
01591     if (use_parent && ob->parent) {
01592         float rmat[4][4], diff_mat[4][4], imat[4][4];
01593         mult_m4_m4m4(diff_mat, ob->parent->obmat, ob->parentinv);
01594         invert_m4_m4(imat, diff_mat);
01595         mult_m4_m4m4(rmat, imat, mat); /* get the parent relative matrix */
01596         object_apply_mat4(ob, rmat, use_compat, FALSE);
01597         
01598         /* same as below, use rmat rather than mat */
01599         mat4_to_loc_rot_size(ob->loc, rot, ob->size, rmat);
01600         object_mat3_to_rot(ob, rot, use_compat);
01601     }
01602     else {
01603         mat4_to_loc_rot_size(ob->loc, rot, ob->size, mat);
01604         object_mat3_to_rot(ob, rot, use_compat);
01605     }
01606     
01607     sub_v3_v3(ob->loc, ob->dloc);
01608 
01609     if (ob->dscale[0] != 0.0f) ob->size[0] /= ob->dscale[0];
01610     if (ob->dscale[1] != 0.0f) ob->size[1] /= ob->dscale[1];
01611     if (ob->dscale[2] != 0.0f) ob->size[2] /= ob->dscale[2];
01612 
01613     /* object_mat3_to_rot handles delta rotations */
01614 }
01615 
01616 void object_to_mat3(Object *ob, float mat[][3]) /* no parent */
01617 {
01618     float smat[3][3];
01619     float rmat[3][3];
01620     /*float q1[4];*/
01621     
01622     /* size */
01623     object_scale_to_mat3(ob, smat);
01624 
01625     /* rot */
01626     object_rot_to_mat3(ob, rmat);
01627     mul_m3_m3m3(mat, rmat, smat);
01628 }
01629 
01630 void object_to_mat4(Object *ob, float mat[][4])
01631 {
01632     float tmat[3][3];
01633     
01634     object_to_mat3(ob, tmat);
01635     
01636     copy_m4_m3(mat, tmat);
01637 
01638     add_v3_v3v3(mat[3], ob->loc, ob->dloc);
01639 }
01640 
01641 /* extern */
01642 int enable_cu_speed= 1;
01643 
01644 static void ob_parcurve(Scene *scene, Object *ob, Object *par, float mat[][4])
01645 {
01646     Curve *cu;
01647     float vec[4], dir[3], quat[4], radius, ctime;
01648     float timeoffs = 0.0, sf_orig = 0.0;
01649     
01650     unit_m4(mat);
01651     
01652     cu= par->data;
01653     if (cu->path==NULL || cu->path->data==NULL) /* only happens on reload file, but violates depsgraph still... fix! */
01654         makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, par, 0);
01655     if (cu->path==NULL) return;
01656     
01657     /* catch exceptions: feature for nla stride editing */
01658     if (ob->ipoflag & OB_DISABLE_PATH) {
01659         ctime= 0.0f;
01660     }
01661     /* catch exceptions: curve paths used as a duplicator */
01662     else if (enable_cu_speed) {
01663         /* ctime is now a proper var setting of Curve which gets set by Animato like any other var that's animated,
01664          * but this will only work if it actually is animated... 
01665          *
01666          * we divide the curvetime calculated in the previous step by the length of the path, to get a time
01667          * factor, which then gets clamped to lie within 0.0 - 1.0 range
01668          */
01669         if (IS_EQF(cu->pathlen, 0.0f) == 0)
01670             ctime= cu->ctime / cu->pathlen;
01671         else
01672             ctime= cu->ctime;
01673 
01674         CLAMP(ctime, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01675     }
01676     else {
01677         ctime= scene->r.cfra;
01678         if (IS_EQF(cu->pathlen, 0.0f) == 0)
01679             ctime /= cu->pathlen;
01680         
01681         CLAMP(ctime, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01682     }
01683     
01684     /* time calculus is correct, now apply distance offset */
01685     if (cu->flag & CU_OFFS_PATHDIST) {
01686         ctime += timeoffs/cu->path->totdist;
01687 
01688         /* restore */
01689         SWAP(float, sf_orig, ob->sf);
01690     }
01691     
01692     
01693     /* vec: 4 items! */
01694     if ( where_on_path(par, ctime, vec, dir, cu->flag & CU_FOLLOW ? quat:NULL, &radius, NULL) ) {
01695 
01696         if (cu->flag & CU_FOLLOW) {
01697 #if 0
01698             float x1, q[4];
01699             vec_to_quat( quat,dir, ob->trackflag, ob->upflag);
01700             
01701             /* the tilt */
01702             normalize_v3(dir);
01703             q[0]= (float)cos(0.5*vec[3]);
01704             x1= (float)sin(0.5*vec[3]);
01705             q[1]= -x1*dir[0];
01706             q[2]= -x1*dir[1];
01707             q[3]= -x1*dir[2];
01708             mul_qt_qtqt(quat, q, quat);
01709 #else
01710             quat_apply_track(quat, ob->trackflag, ob->upflag);
01711 #endif
01712             normalize_qt(quat);
01713             quat_to_mat4(mat, quat);
01714         }
01715         
01716         if (cu->flag & CU_PATH_RADIUS) {
01717             float tmat[4][4], rmat[4][4];
01718             scale_m4_fl(tmat, radius);
01719             mult_m4_m4m4(rmat, tmat, mat);
01720             copy_m4_m4(mat, rmat);
01721         }
01722 
01723         copy_v3_v3(mat[3], vec);
01724         
01725     }
01726 }
01727 
01728 static void ob_parbone(Object *ob, Object *par, float mat[][4])
01729 {   
01730     bPoseChannel *pchan;
01731     float vec[3];
01732     
01733     if (par->type!=OB_ARMATURE) {
01734         unit_m4(mat);
01735         return;
01736     }
01737     
01738     /* Make sure the bone is still valid */
01739     pchan= get_pose_channel(par->pose, ob->parsubstr);
01740     if (!pchan) {
01741         printf ("Object %s with Bone parent: bone %s doesn't exist\n", ob->id.name+2, ob->parsubstr);
01742         unit_m4(mat);
01743         return;
01744     }
01745 
01746     /* get bone transform */
01747     copy_m4_m4(mat, pchan->pose_mat);
01748 
01749     /* but for backwards compatibility, the child has to move to the tail */
01750     copy_v3_v3(vec, mat[1]);
01751     mul_v3_fl(vec, pchan->bone->length);
01752     add_v3_v3(mat[3], vec);
01753 }
01754 
01755 static void give_parvert(Object *par, int nr, float vec[3])
01756 {
01757     BMEditMesh *em;
01758     int a, count;
01759     
01760     vec[0]=vec[1]=vec[2]= 0.0f;
01761     
01762     if (par->type==OB_MESH) {
01763         Mesh *me= par->data;
01764         DerivedMesh *dm;
01765 
01766         em = me->edit_btmesh;
01767 
01768 #if 0   /* this was bmesh only, better, evaluate why this was needed - campbell*/
01769         if (em) {
01770             BMVert *eve;
01771             BMIter iter;
01772 
01773             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01774                 int *keyindex = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_SHAPE_KEYINDEX);
01775                 
01776                 if (keyindex && *keyindex==nr) {
01777                     copy_v3_v3(vec, eve->co);
01778                     break;
01779                 }
01780             }
01781         }
01782 #endif
01783 
01784         dm = (em)? em->derivedFinal: par->derivedFinal;
01785             
01786         if (dm) {
01787             MVert *mvert= dm->getVertArray(dm);
01788             int *index = (int *)dm->getVertDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01789             int i, vindex, numVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
01790 
01791             /* get the average of all verts with (original index == nr) */
01792             count= 0;
01793             for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++) {
01794                 vindex= (index)? index[i]: i;
01795 
01796                 if (vindex == nr) {
01797                     add_v3_v3(vec, mvert[i].co);
01798                     count++;
01799                 }
01800             }
01801 
01802             if (count==0) {
01803                 /* keep as 0,0,0 */
01804             }
01805             else if (count > 0) {
01806                 mul_v3_fl(vec, 1.0f / count);
01807             }
01808             else {
01809                 /* use first index if its out of range */
01810                 dm->getVertCo(dm, 0, vec);
01811             }
01812         }
01813         else fprintf(stderr, "%s: DerivedMesh is needed to solve parenting, object position can be wrong now\n", __func__);
01814     }
01815     else if (ELEM(par->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
01816         Nurb *nu;
01817         Curve *cu;
01818         BPoint *bp;
01819         BezTriple *bezt;
01820         int found= 0;
01821         ListBase *nurbs;
01822 
01823         cu= par->data;
01824         nurbs= BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
01825         nu= nurbs->first;
01826 
01827         count= 0;
01828         while (nu && !found) {
01829             if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
01830                 bezt= nu->bezt;
01831                 a= nu->pntsu;
01832                 while (a--) {
01833                     if (count==nr) {
01834                         found= 1;
01835                         copy_v3_v3(vec, bezt->vec[1]);
01836                         break;
01837                     }
01838                     count++;
01839                     bezt++;
01840                 }
01841             }
01842             else {
01843                 bp= nu->bp;
01844                 a= nu->pntsu*nu->pntsv;
01845                 while (a--) {
01846                     if (count==nr) {
01847                         found= 1;
01848                         memcpy(vec, bp->vec, sizeof(float)*3);
01849                         break;
01850                     }
01851                     count++;
01852                     bp++;
01853                 }
01854             }
01855             nu= nu->next;
01856         }
01857 
01858     }
01859     else if (par->type==OB_LATTICE) {
01860         Lattice *latt= par->data;
01861         BPoint *bp;
01862         DispList *dl = find_displist(&par->disp, DL_VERTS);
01863         float *co = dl?dl->verts:NULL;
01864         
01865         if (latt->editlatt) latt= latt->editlatt->latt;
01866         
01867         a= latt->pntsu*latt->pntsv*latt->pntsw;
01868         count= 0;
01869         bp= latt->def;
01870         while (a--) {
01871             if (count==nr) {
01872                 if (co)
01873                     memcpy(vec, co, 3*sizeof(float));
01874                 else
01875                     memcpy(vec, bp->vec, 3*sizeof(float));
01876                 break;
01877             }
01878             count++;
01879             if (co) co+= 3;
01880             else bp++;
01881         }
01882     }
01883 }
01884 
01885 static void ob_parvert3(Object *ob, Object *par, float mat[][4])
01886 {
01887     float cmat[3][3], v1[3], v2[3], v3[3], q[4];
01888 
01889     /* in local ob space */
01890     unit_m4(mat);
01891     
01892     if (ELEM4(par->type, OB_MESH, OB_SURF, OB_CURVE, OB_LATTICE)) {
01893         
01894         give_parvert(par, ob->par1, v1);
01895         give_parvert(par, ob->par2, v2);
01896         give_parvert(par, ob->par3, v3);
01897                 
01898         tri_to_quat( q,v1, v2, v3);
01899         quat_to_mat3( cmat,q);
01900         copy_m4_m3(mat, cmat);
01901         
01902         if (ob->type==OB_CURVE) {
01903             copy_v3_v3(mat[3], v1);
01904         }
01905         else {
01906             add_v3_v3v3(mat[3], v1, v2);
01907             add_v3_v3(mat[3], v3);
01908             mul_v3_fl(mat[3], 0.3333333f);
01909         }
01910     }
01911 }
01912 
01913 static int where_is_object_parslow(Object *ob, float obmat[4][4], float slowmat[4][4])
01914 {
01915     float *fp1, *fp2;
01916     float fac1, fac2;
01917     int a;
01918 
01919     // include framerate
01920     fac1= ( 1.0f / (1.0f + fabsf(ob->sf)) );
01921     if (fac1 >= 1.0f) return 0;
01922     fac2= 1.0f-fac1;
01923 
01924     fp1= obmat[0];
01925     fp2= slowmat[0];
01926     for (a=0; a<16; a++, fp1++, fp2++) {
01927         fp1[0]= fac1*fp1[0] + fac2*fp2[0];
01928     }
01929 
01930     return 1;
01931 }
01932 
01933 void where_is_object_time(Scene *scene, Object *ob, float ctime)
01934 {
01935     float slowmat[4][4] = MAT4_UNITY;
01936     float stime=ctime;
01937     
01938     /* new version: correct parent+vertexparent and track+parent */
01939     /* this one only calculates direct attached parent and track */
01940     /* is faster, but should keep track of timeoffs */
01941     
01942     if (ob==NULL) return;
01943     
01944     /* execute drivers only, as animation has already been done */
01945     BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene, &ob->id, ob->adt, ctime, ADT_RECALC_DRIVERS);
01946     
01947     if (ob->parent) {
01948         Object *par= ob->parent;
01949         
01950         /* hurms, code below conflicts with depgraph... (ton) */
01951         /* and even worse, it gives bad effects for NLA stride too (try ctime != par->ctime, with MBlur) */
01952         if (stime != par->ctime) {
01953             // only for ipo systems? 
01954             Object tmp= *par;
01955             
01956             if (par->proxy_from);   // was a copied matrix, no where_is! bad...
01957             else where_is_object_time(scene, par, ctime);
01958             
01959             solve_parenting(scene, ob, par, ob->obmat, slowmat, 0);
01960             
01961             *par= tmp;
01962         }
01963         else
01964             solve_parenting(scene, ob, par, ob->obmat, slowmat, 0);
01965         
01966         /* "slow parent" is definitely not threadsafe, and may also give bad results jumping around 
01967          * An old-fashioned hack which probably doesn't really cut it anymore
01968          */
01969         if (ob->partype & PARSLOW) {
01970             if (!where_is_object_parslow(ob, ob->obmat, slowmat))
01971                 return;
01972         }
01973     }
01974     else {
01975         object_to_mat4(ob, ob->obmat);
01976     }
01977 
01978     /* solve constraints */
01979     if (ob->constraints.first && !(ob->transflag & OB_NO_CONSTRAINTS)) {
01980         bConstraintOb *cob;
01981         
01982         cob= constraints_make_evalob(scene, ob, NULL, CONSTRAINT_OBTYPE_OBJECT);
01983         
01984         /* constraints need ctime, not stime. Some call where_is_object_time and bsystem_time */
01985         solve_constraints (&ob->constraints, cob, ctime);
01986         
01987         constraints_clear_evalob(cob);
01988     }
01989     
01990     /* set negative scale flag in object */
01991     if (is_negative_m4(ob->obmat))  ob->transflag |= OB_NEG_SCALE;
01992     else                            ob->transflag &= ~OB_NEG_SCALE;
01993 }
01994 
01995 /* get object transformation matrix without recalculating dependencies and
01996  * constraints -- assume dependencies are already solved by depsgraph.
01997  * no changes to object and it's parent would be done.
01998  * used for bundles orientation in 3d space relative to parented blender camera */
01999 void where_is_object_mat(Scene *scene, Object *ob, float obmat[4][4])
02000 {
02001     float slowmat[4][4] = MAT4_UNITY;
02002 
02003     if (ob->parent) {
02004         Object *par= ob->parent;
02005 
02006         solve_parenting(scene, ob, par, obmat, slowmat, 1);
02007 
02008         if (ob->partype & PARSLOW)
02009             where_is_object_parslow(ob, obmat, slowmat);
02010     }
02011     else {
02012         object_to_mat4(ob, obmat);
02013     }
02014 }
02015 
02016 static void solve_parenting (Scene *scene, Object *ob, Object *par, float obmat[][4], float slowmat[][4], int simul)
02017 {
02018     float totmat[4][4];
02019     float tmat[4][4];
02020     float locmat[4][4];
02021     float vec[3];
02022     int ok;
02023     
02024     object_to_mat4(ob, locmat);
02025     
02026     if (ob->partype & PARSLOW) copy_m4_m4(slowmat, obmat);
02027 
02028     switch(ob->partype & PARTYPE) {
02029     case PAROBJECT:
02030         ok= 0;
02031         if (par->type==OB_CURVE) {
02032             if ( ((Curve *)par->data)->flag & CU_PATH ) {
02033                 ob_parcurve(scene, ob, par, tmat);
02034                 ok= 1;
02035             }
02036         }
02037         
02038         if (ok) mul_serie_m4(totmat, par->obmat, tmat, 
02039             NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
02040         else copy_m4_m4(totmat, par->obmat);
02041         
02042         break;
02043     case PARBONE:
02044         ob_parbone(ob, par, tmat);
02045         mul_serie_m4(totmat, par->obmat, tmat,         
02046             NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
02047         break;
02048         
02049     case PARVERT1:
02050         unit_m4(totmat);
02051         if (simul) {
02052             copy_v3_v3(totmat[3], par->obmat[3]);
02053         }
02054         else {
02055             give_parvert(par, ob->par1, vec);
02056             mul_v3_m4v3(totmat[3], par->obmat, vec);
02057         }
02058         break;
02059     case PARVERT3:
02060         ob_parvert3(ob, par, tmat);
02061         
02062         mul_serie_m4(totmat, par->obmat, tmat,         
02063             NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
02064         break;
02065         
02066     case PARSKEL:
02067         copy_m4_m4(totmat, par->obmat);
02068         break;
02069     }
02070     
02071     // total 
02072     mul_serie_m4(tmat, totmat, ob->parentinv,         
02073         NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
02074     mul_serie_m4(obmat, tmat, locmat,         
02075         NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
02076     
02077     if (simul) {
02078 
02079     }
02080     else {
02081         // external usable originmat 
02082         copy_m3_m4(originmat, tmat);
02083         
02084         // origin, voor help line
02085         if ( (ob->partype & PARTYPE)==PARSKEL ) {
02086             copy_v3_v3(ob->orig, par->obmat[3]);
02087         }
02088         else {
02089             copy_v3_v3(ob->orig, totmat[3]);
02090         }
02091     }
02092 
02093 }
02094 
02095 void where_is_object(struct Scene *scene, Object *ob)
02096 {
02097     where_is_object_time(scene, ob, (float)scene->r.cfra);
02098 }
02099 
02100 
02101 void where_is_object_simul(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
02102 /* was written for the old game engine (until 2.04) */
02103 /* It seems that this function is only called
02104  * for a lamp that is the child of another object */
02105 {
02106     Object *par;
02107     float *fp1, *fp2;
02108     float slowmat[4][4];
02109     float fac1, fac2;
02110     int a;
02111     
02112     /* NO TIMEOFFS */
02113     if (ob->parent) {
02114         par= ob->parent;
02115         
02116         solve_parenting(scene, ob, par, ob->obmat, slowmat, 1);
02117         
02118         if (ob->partype & PARSLOW) {
02119             fac1= (float)(1.0/(1.0+ fabs(ob->sf)));
02120             fac2= 1.0f-fac1;
02121             fp1= ob->obmat[0];
02122             fp2= slowmat[0];
02123             for (a=0; a<16; a++, fp1++, fp2++) {
02124                 fp1[0]= fac1*fp1[0] + fac2*fp2[0];
02125             }
02126         }
02127     }
02128     else {
02129         object_to_mat4(ob, ob->obmat);
02130     }
02131     
02132     /* solve constraints */
02133     if (ob->constraints.first) {
02134         bConstraintOb *cob;
02135         
02136         cob= constraints_make_evalob(scene, ob, NULL, CONSTRAINT_OBTYPE_OBJECT);
02137         solve_constraints(&ob->constraints, cob, (float)scene->r.cfra);
02138         constraints_clear_evalob(cob);
02139     }
02140 }
02141 
02142 /* for calculation of the inverse parent transform, only used for editor */
02143 void what_does_parent(Scene *scene, Object *ob, Object *workob)
02144 {
02145     clear_workob(workob);
02146     
02147     unit_m4(workob->obmat);
02148     unit_m4(workob->parentinv);
02149     unit_m4(workob->constinv);
02150     workob->parent= ob->parent;
02151 
02152     workob->trackflag= ob->trackflag;
02153     workob->upflag= ob->upflag;
02154     
02155     workob->partype= ob->partype;
02156     workob->par1= ob->par1;
02157     workob->par2= ob->par2;
02158     workob->par3= ob->par3;
02159 
02160     workob->constraints.first = ob->constraints.first;
02161     workob->constraints.last = ob->constraints.last;
02162 
02163     BLI_strncpy(workob->parsubstr, ob->parsubstr, sizeof(workob->parsubstr));
02164 
02165     where_is_object(scene, workob);
02166 }
02167 
02168 BoundBox *unit_boundbox(void)
02169 {
02170     BoundBox *bb;
02171     float min[3] = {-1.0f,-1.0f,-1.0f}, max[3] = {-1.0f,-1.0f,-1.0f};
02172 
02173     bb= MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoundBox), "OB-BoundBox");
02174     boundbox_set_from_min_max(bb, min, max);
02175     
02176     return bb;
02177 }
02178 
02179 void boundbox_set_from_min_max(BoundBox *bb, float min[3], float max[3])
02180 {
02181     bb->vec[0][0]=bb->vec[1][0]=bb->vec[2][0]=bb->vec[3][0]= min[0];
02182     bb->vec[4][0]=bb->vec[5][0]=bb->vec[6][0]=bb->vec[7][0]= max[0];
02183     
02184     bb->vec[0][1]=bb->vec[1][1]=bb->vec[4][1]=bb->vec[5][1]= min[1];
02185     bb->vec[2][1]=bb->vec[3][1]=bb->vec[6][1]=bb->vec[7][1]= max[1];
02186 
02187     bb->vec[0][2]=bb->vec[3][2]=bb->vec[4][2]=bb->vec[7][2]= min[2];
02188     bb->vec[1][2]=bb->vec[2][2]=bb->vec[5][2]=bb->vec[6][2]= max[2];
02189 }
02190 
02191 BoundBox *object_get_boundbox(Object *ob)
02192 {
02193     BoundBox *bb= NULL;
02194     
02195     if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
02196         bb = mesh_get_bb(ob);
02197     }
02198     else if (ELEM3(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_FONT)) {
02199         bb= ob->bb ? ob->bb : ( (Curve *)ob->data )->bb;
02200     }
02201     else if (ob->type==OB_MBALL) {
02202         bb= ob->bb;
02203     }
02204     return bb;
02205 }
02206 
02207 /* used to temporally disable/enable boundbox */
02208 void object_boundbox_flag(Object *ob, int flag, int set)
02209 {
02210     BoundBox *bb= object_get_boundbox(ob);
02211     if (bb) {
02212         if (set) bb->flag |= flag;
02213         else bb->flag &= ~flag;
02214     }
02215 }
02216 
02217 void object_get_dimensions(Object *ob, float vec[3])
02218 {
02219     BoundBox *bb = NULL;
02220     
02221     bb= object_get_boundbox(ob);
02222     if (bb) {
02223         float scale[3];
02224         
02225         mat4_to_size( scale,ob->obmat);
02226         
02227         vec[0] = fabsf(scale[0]) * (bb->vec[4][0] - bb->vec[0][0]);
02228         vec[1] = fabsf(scale[1]) * (bb->vec[2][1] - bb->vec[0][1]);
02229         vec[2] = fabsf(scale[2]) * (bb->vec[1][2] - bb->vec[0][2]);
02230     }
02231     else {
02232         zero_v3(vec);
02233     }
02234 }
02235 
02236 void object_set_dimensions(Object *ob, const float *value)
02237 {
02238     BoundBox *bb = NULL;
02239     
02240     bb= object_get_boundbox(ob);
02241     if (bb) {
02242         float scale[3], len[3];
02243         
02244         mat4_to_size( scale,ob->obmat);
02245         
02246         len[0] = bb->vec[4][0] - bb->vec[0][0];
02247         len[1] = bb->vec[2][1] - bb->vec[0][1];
02248         len[2] = bb->vec[1][2] - bb->vec[0][2];
02249         
02250         if (len[0] > 0.f) ob->size[0] = value[0] / len[0];
02251         if (len[1] > 0.f) ob->size[1] = value[1] / len[1];
02252         if (len[2] > 0.f) ob->size[2] = value[2] / len[2];
02253     }
02254 }
02255 
02256 void minmax_object(Object *ob, float min[3], float max[3])
02257 {
02258     BoundBox bb;
02259     float vec[3];
02260     int a;
02261     short change= FALSE;
02262     
02263     switch(ob->type) {
02264     case OB_CURVE:
02265     case OB_FONT:
02266     case OB_SURF:
02267         {
02268             Curve *cu= ob->data;
02269 
02270             if (cu->bb==NULL) tex_space_curve(cu);
02271             bb= *(cu->bb);
02272 
02273             for (a=0; a<8; a++) {
02274                 mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, bb.vec[a]);
02275                 DO_MINMAX(bb.vec[a], min, max);
02276             }
02277             change= TRUE;
02278         }
02279         break;
02280     case OB_LATTICE:
02281         {
02282             Lattice *lt= ob->data;
02283             BPoint *bp= lt->def;
02284             int u, v, w;
02285 
02286             for (w=0; w<lt->pntsw; w++) {
02287                 for (v=0; v<lt->pntsv; v++) {
02288                     for (u=0; u<lt->pntsu; u++, bp++) {
02289                         mul_v3_m4v3(vec, ob->obmat, bp->vec);
02290                         DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
02291                     }
02292                 }
02293             }
02294             change= TRUE;
02295         }
02296         break;
02297     case OB_ARMATURE:
02298         if (ob->pose) {
02299             bPoseChannel *pchan;
02300             for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
02301                 mul_v3_m4v3(vec, ob->obmat, pchan->pose_head);
02302                 DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
02303                 mul_v3_m4v3(vec, ob->obmat, pchan->pose_tail);
02304                 DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
02305             }
02306             change= TRUE;
02307         }
02308         break;
02309     case OB_MESH:
02310         {
02311             Mesh *me= get_mesh(ob);
02312 
02313             if (me) {
02314                 bb = *mesh_get_bb(ob);
02315 
02316                 for (a=0; a<8; a++) {
02317                     mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, bb.vec[a]);
02318                     DO_MINMAX(bb.vec[a], min, max);
02319                 }
02320                 change= TRUE;
02321             }
02322         }
02323         break;
02324     }
02325 
02326     if (change == FALSE) {
02327         DO_MINMAX(ob->obmat[3], min, max);
02328 
02329         copy_v3_v3(vec, ob->obmat[3]);
02330         add_v3_v3(vec, ob->size);
02331         DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
02332 
02333         copy_v3_v3(vec, ob->obmat[3]);
02334         sub_v3_v3(vec, ob->size);
02335         DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
02336     }
02337 }
02338 
02339 int minmax_object_duplis(Scene *scene, Object *ob, float min[3], float max[3])
02340 {
02341     int ok= 0;
02342     if ((ob->transflag & OB_DUPLI)==0) {
02343         return ok;
02344     }
02345     else {
02346         ListBase *lb;
02347         DupliObject *dob;
02348         
02349         lb= object_duplilist(scene, ob);
02350         for (dob= lb->first; dob; dob= dob->next) {
02351             if (dob->no_draw == 0) {
02352                 BoundBox *bb= object_get_boundbox(dob->ob);
02353 
02354                 if (bb) {
02355                     int i;
02356                     for (i=0; i<8; i++) {
02357                         float vec[3];
02358                         mul_v3_m4v3(vec, dob->mat, bb->vec[i]);
02359                         DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
02360                     }
02361 
02362                     ok= 1;
02363                 }
02364             }
02365         }
02366         free_object_duplilist(lb);  /* does restore */
02367     }
02368 
02369     return ok;
02370 }
02371 
02372 void BKE_object_foreach_display_point(
02373         Object *ob, float obmat[4][4],
02374         void (*func_cb)(const float[3], void *), void *user_data)
02375 {
02376     float co[3];
02377 
02378     if (ob->derivedFinal) {
02379         DerivedMesh *dm= ob->derivedFinal;
02380         MVert *mv= dm->getVertArray(dm);
02381         int totvert= dm->getNumVerts(dm);
02382         int i;
02383 
02384         for (i= 0; i < totvert; i++, mv++) {
02385             mul_v3_m4v3(co, obmat, mv->co);
02386             func_cb(co, user_data);
02387         }
02388     }
02389     else if (ob->disp.first) {
02390         DispList *dl;
02391 
02392         for (dl=ob->disp.first; dl; dl=dl->next) {
02393             float *v3= dl->verts;
02394             int totvert= dl->nr;
02395             int i;
02396 
02397             for (i= 0; i < totvert; i++, v3+=3) {
02398                 mul_v3_m4v3(co, obmat, v3);
02399                 func_cb(co, user_data);
02400             }
02401         }
02402     }
02403 }
02404 
02405 void BKE_scene_foreach_display_point(
02406         Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, const short flag,
02407         void (*func_cb)(const float[3], void *), void *user_data)
02408 {
02409     Base *base;
02410     Object *ob;
02411 
02412     for (base= FIRSTBASE; base; base = base->next) {
02413         if (BASE_VISIBLE(v3d, base) && (base->flag & flag) == flag) {
02414             ob= base->object;
02415 
02416             if ((ob->transflag & OB_DUPLI)==0) {
02417                 BKE_object_foreach_display_point(ob, ob->obmat, func_cb, user_data);
02418             }
02419             else {
02420                 ListBase *lb;
02421                 DupliObject *dob;
02422 
02423                 lb= object_duplilist(scene, ob);
02424                 for (dob= lb->first; dob; dob= dob->next) {
02425                     if (dob->no_draw == 0) {
