02426                         BKE_object_foreach_display_point(dob->ob, dob->mat, func_cb, user_data);
02427                     }
02428                 }
02429                 free_object_duplilist(lb);  /* does restore */
02430             }
02431         }
02432     }
02433 }
02434 
02435 /* copied from DNA_object_types.h */
02436 typedef struct ObTfmBack {
02437     float loc[3], dloc[3], orig[3];
02438     float size[3], dscale[3];   /* scale and delta scale */
02439     float rot[3], drot[3];      /* euler rotation */
02440     float quat[4], dquat[4];    /* quaternion rotation */
02441     float rotAxis[3], drotAxis[3];  /* axis angle rotation - axis part */
02442     float rotAngle, drotAngle;  /* axis angle rotation - angle part */
02443     float obmat[4][4];      /* final worldspace matrix with constraints & animsys applied */
02444     float parentinv[4][4]; /* inverse result of parent, so that object doesn't 'stick' to parent */
02445     float constinv[4][4]; /* inverse result of constraints. doesn't include effect of parent or object local transform */
02446     float imat[4][4];   /* inverse matrix of 'obmat' for during render, old game engine, temporally: ipokeys of transform  */
02447 } ObTfmBack;
02448 
02449 void *object_tfm_backup(Object *ob)
02450 {
02451     ObTfmBack *obtfm= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(ObTfmBack), "ObTfmBack");
02452     copy_v3_v3(obtfm->loc, ob->loc);
02453     copy_v3_v3(obtfm->dloc, ob->dloc);
02454     copy_v3_v3(obtfm->orig, ob->orig);
02455     copy_v3_v3(obtfm->size, ob->size);
02456     copy_v3_v3(obtfm->dscale, ob->dscale);
02457     copy_v3_v3(obtfm->rot, ob->rot);
02458     copy_v3_v3(obtfm->drot, ob->drot);
02459     copy_qt_qt(obtfm->quat, ob->quat);
02460     copy_qt_qt(obtfm->dquat, ob->dquat);
02461     copy_v3_v3(obtfm->rotAxis, ob->rotAxis);
02462     copy_v3_v3(obtfm->drotAxis, ob->drotAxis);
02463     obtfm->rotAngle= ob->rotAngle;
02464     obtfm->drotAngle= ob->drotAngle;
02465     copy_m4_m4(obtfm->obmat, ob->obmat);
02466     copy_m4_m4(obtfm->parentinv, ob->parentinv);
02467     copy_m4_m4(obtfm->constinv, ob->constinv);
02468     copy_m4_m4(obtfm->imat, ob->imat);
02469 
02470     return (void *)obtfm;
02471 }
02472 
02473 void object_tfm_restore(Object *ob, void *obtfm_pt)
02474 {
02475     ObTfmBack *obtfm= (ObTfmBack *)obtfm_pt;
02476     copy_v3_v3(ob->loc, obtfm->loc);
02477     copy_v3_v3(ob->dloc, obtfm->dloc);
02478     copy_v3_v3(ob->orig, obtfm->orig);
02479     copy_v3_v3(ob->size, obtfm->size);
02480     copy_v3_v3(ob->dscale, obtfm->dscale);
02481     copy_v3_v3(ob->rot, obtfm->rot);
02482     copy_v3_v3(ob->drot, obtfm->drot);
02483     copy_qt_qt(ob->quat, obtfm->quat);
02484     copy_qt_qt(ob->dquat, obtfm->dquat);
02485     copy_v3_v3(ob->rotAxis, obtfm->rotAxis);
02486     copy_v3_v3(ob->drotAxis, obtfm->drotAxis);
02487     ob->rotAngle= obtfm->rotAngle;
02488     ob->drotAngle= obtfm->drotAngle;
02489     copy_m4_m4(ob->obmat, obtfm->obmat);
02490     copy_m4_m4(ob->parentinv, obtfm->parentinv);
02491     copy_m4_m4(ob->constinv, obtfm->constinv);
02492     copy_m4_m4(ob->imat, obtfm->imat);
02493 }
02494 
02495 int BKE_object_parent_loop_check(const Object *par, const Object *ob)
02496 {
02497     /* test if 'ob' is a parent somewhere in par's parents */
02498     if (par == NULL) return 0;
02499     if (ob == par) return 1;
02500     return BKE_object_parent_loop_check(par->parent, ob);
02501 }
02502 
02503 /* proxy rule: lib_object->proxy_from == the one we borrow from, only set temporal and cleared here */
02504 /*           local_object->proxy      == pointer to library object, saved in files and read */
02505 
02506 /* function below is polluted with proxy exceptions, cleanup will follow! */
02507 
02508 /* the main object update call, for object matrix, constraints, keys and displist (modifiers) */
02509 /* requires flags to be set! */
02510 void object_handle_update(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
02511 {
02512     if (ob->recalc & OB_RECALC_ALL) {
02513         /* speed optimization for animation lookups */
02514         if (ob->pose)
02515             make_pose_channels_hash(ob->pose);
02516 
02517         if (ob->recalc & OB_RECALC_DATA) {
02518             if (ob->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
02519                 /* this happens for reading old files and to match library armatures
02520                  * with poses we do it ahead of where_is_object to ensure animation
02521                  * is evaluated on the rebuilt pose, otherwise we get incorrect poses
02522                  * on file load */
02523                 if (ob->pose==NULL || (ob->pose->flag & POSE_RECALC))
02524                     armature_rebuild_pose(ob, ob->data);
02525             }
02526         }
02527 
02528         /* XXX new animsys warning: depsgraph tag OB_RECALC_DATA should not skip drivers, 
02529          * which is only in where_is_object now */
02530         // XXX: should this case be OB_RECALC_OB instead?
02531         if (ob->recalc & OB_RECALC_ALL) {
02532             
02533             if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
02534                 printf("recalcob %s\n", ob->id.name+2);
02535             
02536             /* handle proxy copy for target */
02537             if (ob->id.lib && ob->proxy_from) {
02538                 // printf("ob proxy copy, lib ob %s proxy %s\n", ob->id.name, ob->proxy_from->id.name);
02539                 if (ob->proxy_from->proxy_group) {/* transform proxy into group space */
02540                     Object *obg= ob->proxy_from->proxy_group;
02541                     invert_m4_m4(obg->imat, obg->obmat);
02542                     mult_m4_m4m4(ob->obmat, obg->imat, ob->proxy_from->obmat);
02543                     if (obg->dup_group) { /* should always be true */
02544                         add_v3_v3(ob->obmat[3], obg->dup_group->dupli_ofs);
02545                     }
02546                 }
02547                 else
02548                     copy_m4_m4(ob->obmat, ob->proxy_from->obmat);
02549             }
02550             else
02551                 where_is_object(scene, ob);
02552         }
02553         
02554         if (ob->recalc & OB_RECALC_DATA) {
02555             ID *data_id= (ID *)ob->data;
02556             AnimData *adt= BKE_animdata_from_id(data_id);
02557             float ctime= (float)scene->r.cfra; // XXX this is bad...
02558             ListBase pidlist;
02559             PTCacheID *pid;
02560             
02561             if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
02562                 printf("recalcdata %s\n", ob->id.name+2);
02563 
02564             if (adt) {
02565                 /* evaluate drivers */
02566                 // XXX: for mesh types, should we push this to derivedmesh instead?
02567                 BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene, data_id, adt, ctime, ADT_RECALC_DRIVERS);
02568             }
02569 
02570             /* includes all keys and modifiers */
02571             switch(ob->type) {
02572             case OB_MESH:
02573                 {
02574 #if 0               // XXX, comment for 2.56a release, background wont set 'scene->customdata_mask'
02575                     BMEditMesh *em = (ob == scene->obedit) ? BMEdit_FromObject(ob) : NULL;
02576                     BLI_assert((scene->customdata_mask & CD_MASK_BAREMESH) == CD_MASK_BAREMESH);
02577                     if (em) {
02578                         makeDerivedMesh(scene, ob, em,  scene->customdata_mask, 0); /* was CD_MASK_BAREMESH */
02579                     }
02580                     else {
02581                         makeDerivedMesh(scene, ob, NULL, scene->customdata_mask, 0);
02582                     }
02583 
02584 #else               /* ensure CD_MASK_BAREMESH for now */
02585                     BMEditMesh *em = (ob == scene->obedit) ? BMEdit_FromObject(ob) : NULL;
02586                     uint64_t data_mask= scene->customdata_mask | ob->customdata_mask | CD_MASK_BAREMESH;
02587                     if (em) {
02588                         makeDerivedMesh(scene, ob, em,  data_mask, 0); /* was CD_MASK_BAREMESH */
02589                     }
02590                     else {
02591                         makeDerivedMesh(scene, ob, NULL, data_mask, 0);
02592                     }
02593 #endif
02594 
02595                 }
02596                 break;
02597 
02598             case OB_ARMATURE:
02599                 if (ob->id.lib && ob->proxy_from) {
02600                     // printf("pose proxy copy, lib ob %s proxy %s\n", ob->id.name, ob->proxy_from->id.name);
02601                     copy_pose_result(ob->pose, ob->proxy_from->pose);
02602                 }
02603                 else {
02604                     where_is_pose(scene, ob);
02605                 }
02606                 break;
02607 
02608             case OB_MBALL:
02609                 makeDispListMBall(scene, ob);
02610                 break;
02611 
02612             case OB_CURVE:
02613             case OB_SURF:
02614             case OB_FONT:
02615                 makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, ob, 0);
02616                 break;
02617                 
02618             case OB_LATTICE:
02619                 lattice_calc_modifiers(scene, ob);
02620                 break;
02621             }
02622 
02623 
02624             if (ob->particlesystem.first) {
02625                 ParticleSystem *tpsys, *psys;
02626                 DerivedMesh *dm;
02627                 ob->transflag &= ~OB_DUPLIPARTS;
02628                 
02629                 psys= ob->particlesystem.first;
02630                 while (psys) {
02631                     if (psys_check_enabled(ob, psys)) {
02632                         /* check use of dupli objects here */
02633                         if (psys->part && (psys->part->draw_as == PART_DRAW_REND || G.rendering) &&
02634                             ((psys->part->ren_as == PART_DRAW_OB && psys->part->dup_ob) ||
02635                              (psys->part->ren_as == PART_DRAW_GR && psys->part->dup_group)))
02636                         {
02637                             ob->transflag |= OB_DUPLIPARTS;
02638                         }
02639 
02640                         particle_system_update(scene, ob, psys);
02641                         psys= psys->next;
02642                     }
02643                     else if (psys->flag & PSYS_DELETE) {
02644                         tpsys=psys->next;
02645                         BLI_remlink(&ob->particlesystem, psys);
02646                         psys_free(ob,psys);
02647                         psys= tpsys;
02648                     }
02649                     else
02650                         psys= psys->next;
02651                 }
02652 
02653                 if (G.rendering && ob->transflag & OB_DUPLIPARTS) {
02654                     /* this is to make sure we get render level duplis in groups:
02655                      * the derivedmesh must be created before init_render_mesh,
02656                      * since object_duplilist does dupliparticles before that */
02657                     dm = mesh_create_derived_render(scene, ob, CD_MASK_BAREMESH|CD_MASK_MTFACE|CD_MASK_MCOL);
02658                     dm->release(dm);
02659 
02660                     for (psys=ob->particlesystem.first; psys; psys=psys->next)
02661                         psys_get_modifier(ob, psys)->flag &= ~eParticleSystemFlag_psys_updated;
02662                 }
02663             }
02664 
02665             /* check if quick cache is needed */
02666             BKE_ptcache_ids_from_object(&pidlist, ob, scene, MAX_DUPLI_RECUR);
02667 
02668             for (pid=pidlist.first; pid; pid=pid->next) {
02669                 if ((pid->cache->flag & PTCACHE_BAKED) ||
02670                     (pid->cache->flag & PTCACHE_QUICK_CACHE) == 0)
02671                 {
02672                     continue;
02673                 }
02674 
02675                 if (pid->cache->flag & PTCACHE_OUTDATED || (pid->cache->flag & PTCACHE_SIMULATION_VALID)==0) {
02676                     scene->physics_settings.quick_cache_step =
02677                         scene->physics_settings.quick_cache_step ?
02678                         MIN2(scene->physics_settings.quick_cache_step, pid->cache->step) :
02679                         pid->cache->step;
02680                 }
02681             }
02682 
02683             BLI_freelistN(&pidlist);
02684         }
02685 
02686         /* the no-group proxy case, we call update */
02687         if (ob->proxy && ob->proxy_group==NULL) {
02688             /* set pointer in library proxy target, for copying, but restore it */
02689             ob->proxy->proxy_from= ob;
02690             // printf("call update, lib ob %s proxy %s\n", ob->proxy->id.name, ob->id.name);
02691             object_handle_update(scene, ob->proxy);
02692         }
02693     
02694         ob->recalc &= ~OB_RECALC_ALL;
02695     }
02696 
02697     /* the case when this is a group proxy, object_update is called in group.c */
02698     if (ob->proxy) {
02699         ob->proxy->proxy_from= ob;
02700         // printf("set proxy pointer for later group stuff %s\n", ob->id.name);
02701     }
02702 }
02703 
02704 void object_sculpt_modifiers_changed(Object *ob)
02705 {
02706     SculptSession *ss= ob->sculpt;
02707 
02708     if (!ss->cache) {
02709         /* we free pbvh on changes, except during sculpt since it can't deal with
02710          * changing PVBH node organization, we hope topology does not change in
02711          * the meantime .. weak */
02712         if (ss->pbvh) {
02713                 BLI_pbvh_free(ss->pbvh);
02714                 ss->pbvh= NULL;
02715         }
02716 
02717         free_sculptsession_deformMats(ob->sculpt);
02718     }
02719     else {
02720         PBVHNode **nodes;
02721         int n, totnode;
02722 
02723         BLI_pbvh_search_gather(ss->pbvh, NULL, NULL, &nodes, &totnode);
02724 
02725         for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++)
02726             BLI_pbvh_node_mark_update(nodes[n]);
02727 
02728         MEM_freeN(nodes);
02729     }
02730 }
02731 
02732 int give_obdata_texspace(Object *ob, short **texflag, float **loc, float **size, float **rot)
02733 {
02734     
02735     if (ob->data==NULL)
02736         return 0;
02737     
02738     switch (GS(((ID *)ob->data)->name)) {
02739     case ID_ME:
02740     {
02741         Mesh *me= ob->data;
02742         if (texflag)    *texflag = &me->texflag;
02743         if (loc)        *loc = me->loc;
02744         if (size)       *size = me->size;
02745         if (rot)        *rot = me->rot;
02746         break;
02747     }
02748     case ID_CU:
02749     {
02750         Curve *cu= ob->data;
02751         if (texflag)    *texflag = &cu->texflag;
02752         if (loc)        *loc = cu->loc;
02753         if (size)       *size = cu->size;
02754         if (rot)        *rot = cu->rot;
02755         break;
02756     }
02757     case ID_MB:
02758     {
02759         MetaBall *mb= ob->data;
02760         if (texflag)    *texflag = &mb->texflag;
02761         if (loc)        *loc = mb->loc;
02762         if (size)       *size = mb->size;
02763         if (rot)        *rot = mb->rot;
02764         break;
02765     }
02766     default:
02767         return 0;
02768     }
02769     return 1;
02770 }
02771 
02772 /*
02773  * Test a bounding box for ray intersection
02774  * assumes the ray is already local to the boundbox space
02775  */
02776 int ray_hit_boundbox(struct BoundBox *bb, float ray_start[3], float ray_normal[3])
02777 {
02778     static int triangle_indexes[12][3] = {{0, 1, 2}, {0, 2, 3},
02779                                           {3, 2, 6}, {3, 6, 7},
02780                                           {1, 2, 6}, {1, 6, 5}, 
02781                                           {5, 6, 7}, {4, 5, 7},
02782                                           {0, 3, 7}, {0, 4, 7},
02783                                           {0, 1, 5}, {0, 4, 5}};
02784     int result = 0;
02785     int i;
02786     
02787     for (i = 0; i < 12 && result == 0; i++)
02788     {
02789         float lambda;
02790         int v1, v2, v3;
02791         v1 = triangle_indexes[i][0];
02792         v2 = triangle_indexes[i][1];
02793         v3 = triangle_indexes[i][2];
02794         result = isect_ray_tri_v3(ray_start, ray_normal, bb->vec[v1], bb->vec[v2], bb->vec[v3], &lambda, NULL);
02795     }
02796     
02797     return result;
02798 }
02799 
02800 static int pc_cmp(void *a, void *b)
02801 {
02802     LinkData *ad = a, *bd = b;
02803     if (GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ad->data) > GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(bd->data))
02804         return 1;
02805     else return 0;
02806 }
02807 
02808 int object_insert_ptcache(Object *ob) 
02809 {
02810     LinkData *link = NULL;
02811     int i = 0;
02812 
02813     BLI_sortlist(&ob->pc_ids, pc_cmp);
02814 
02815     for (link=ob->pc_ids.first, i = 0; link; link=link->next, i++) 
02816     {
02817         int index = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(link->data);
02818 
02819         if (i < index)
02820             break;
02821     }
02822 
02823     link = MEM_callocN(sizeof(LinkData), "PCLink");
02824     link->data = SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i);
02825     BLI_addtail(&ob->pc_ids, link);
02826 
02827     return i;
02828 }
02829 
02830 #if 0
02831 static int pc_findindex(ListBase *listbase, int index)
02832 {
02833     LinkData *link= NULL;
02834     int number= 0;
02835     
02836     if (listbase == NULL) return -1;
02837     
02838     link= listbase->first;
02839     while (link) {
02840         if ((int)link->data == index)
02841             return number;
02842         
02843         number++;
02844         link= link->next;
02845     }
02846     
02847     return -1;
02848 }
02849 
02850 void object_delete_ptcache(Object *ob, int index) 
02851 {
02852     int list_index = pc_findindex(&ob->pc_ids, index);
02853     LinkData *link = BLI_findlink(&ob->pc_ids, list_index);
02854     BLI_freelinkN(&ob->pc_ids, link);
02855 }

02858 /* shape key utility function */
02859 
02860 /************************* Mesh ************************/
02861 static KeyBlock *insert_meshkey(Scene *scene, Object *ob, const char *name, int from_mix)
02862 {
02863     Mesh *me= ob->data;
02864     Key *key= me->key;
02865     KeyBlock *kb;
02866     int newkey= 0;
02867 
02868     if (key == NULL) {
02869         key= me->key= add_key((ID *)me);
02870         key->type= KEY_RELATIVE;
02871         newkey= 1;
02872     }
02873 
02874     if (newkey || from_mix==FALSE) {
02875         /* create from mesh */
02876         kb = add_keyblock_ctime(key, name, FALSE);
02877         mesh_to_key(me, kb);
02878     }
02879     else {
02880         /* copy from current values */
02881         float *data= do_ob_key(scene, ob);
02882 
02883         /* create new block with prepared data */
02884         kb = add_keyblock_ctime(key, name, FALSE);
02885         kb->data= data;
02886         kb->totelem= me->totvert;
02887     }
02888 
02889     return kb;
02890 }
02891 /************************* Lattice ************************/
02892 static KeyBlock *insert_lattkey(Scene *scene, Object *ob, const char *name, int from_mix)
02893 {
02894     Lattice *lt= ob->data;
02895     Key *key= lt->key;
02896     KeyBlock *kb;
02897     int newkey= 0;
02898 
02899     if (key==NULL) {
02900         key= lt->key= add_key( (ID *)lt);
02901         key->type= KEY_RELATIVE;
02902         newkey= 1;
02903     }
02904 
02905     if (newkey || from_mix==FALSE) {
02906         kb = add_keyblock_ctime(key, name, FALSE);
02907         if (!newkey) {
02908             KeyBlock *basekb= (KeyBlock *)key->block.first;
02909             kb->data= MEM_dupallocN(basekb->data);
02910             kb->totelem= basekb->totelem;
02911         }
02912         else {
02913             latt_to_key(lt, kb);
02914         }
02915     }
02916     else {
02917         /* copy from current values */
02918         float *data= do_ob_key(scene, ob);
02919 
02920         /* create new block with prepared data */
02921         kb = add_keyblock_ctime(key, name, FALSE);
02922         kb->totelem= lt->pntsu*lt->pntsv*lt->pntsw;
02923         kb->data= data;
02924     }
02925 
02926     return kb;
02927 }
02928 /************************* Curve ************************/
02929 static KeyBlock *insert_curvekey(Scene *scene, Object *ob, const char *name, int from_mix)
02930 {
02931     Curve *cu= ob->data;
02932     Key *key= cu->key;
02933     KeyBlock *kb;
02934     ListBase *lb= BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
02935     int newkey= 0;
02936 
02937     if (key==NULL) {
02938         key= cu->key= add_key( (ID *)cu);
02939         key->type = KEY_RELATIVE;
02940         newkey= 1;
02941     }
02942 
02943     if (newkey || from_mix==FALSE) {
02944         /* create from curve */
02945         kb = add_keyblock_ctime(key, name, FALSE);
02946         if (!newkey) {
02947             KeyBlock *basekb= (KeyBlock *)key->block.first;
02948             kb->data= MEM_dupallocN(basekb->data);
02949             kb->totelem= basekb->totelem;
02950         }
02951         else {
02952             curve_to_key(cu, kb, lb);
02953         }
02954     }
02955     else {
02956         /* copy from current values */
02957         float *data= do_ob_key(scene, ob);
02958 
02959         /* create new block with prepared data */
02960         kb = add_keyblock_ctime(key, name, FALSE);
02961         kb->totelem= count_curveverts(lb);
02962         kb->data= data;
02963     }
02964 
02965     return kb;
02966 }
02967 
02968 KeyBlock *object_insert_shape_key(Scene *scene, Object *ob, const char *name, int from_mix)
02969 {   
02970     switch (ob->type) {
02971         case OB_MESH:
02972             return insert_meshkey(scene, ob, name, from_mix);
02973         case OB_CURVE:
02974         case OB_SURF:
02975             return insert_curvekey(scene, ob, name, from_mix);
02976         case OB_LATTICE:
02977             return insert_lattkey(scene, ob, name, from_mix);
02978         default:
02979             return NULL;
02980     }
02981 
02982 }
02983 
02984 /* most important if this is modified it should _always_ return True, in certain
02985  * cases false positives are hard to avoid (shape keys for eg)
02986  */
02987 int object_is_modified(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
02988 {
02989     int flag= 0;
02990 
02991     if (ob_get_key(ob)) {
02992         flag |= eModifierMode_Render;
02993     }
02994     else {
02995         ModifierData *md;
02996         /* cloth */
02997         for (md=modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
02998              md && (flag != (eModifierMode_Render | eModifierMode_Realtime));
02999              md=md->next)
03000         {
03001             if ((flag & eModifierMode_Render) == 0  && modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, eModifierMode_Render)) {
03002                 flag |= eModifierMode_Render;
03003             }
03004 
03005             if ((flag & eModifierMode_Realtime) == 0    && modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, eModifierMode_Realtime)) {
03006                 flag |= eModifierMode_Realtime;
03007             }
03008         }
03009     }
03010 
03011     return flag;
03012 }
03013 
03014 static void copy_object__forwardModifierLinks(void *UNUSED(userData), Object *UNUSED(ob), ID **idpoin)
03015 {
03016     /* this is copied from ID_NEW; it might be better to have a macro */
03017     if (*idpoin && (*idpoin)->newid) *idpoin = (*idpoin)->newid;
03018 }
03019 
03020 void object_relink(Object *ob)
03021 {
03022     if (ob->id.lib)
03023         return;
03024 
03025     relink_constraints(&ob->constraints);
03026     if (ob->pose) {
03027         bPoseChannel *chan;
03028         for (chan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; chan; chan=chan->next) {
03029             relink_constraints(&chan->constraints);
03030         }
03031     }
03032     modifiers_foreachIDLink(ob, copy_object__forwardModifierLinks, NULL);
03033 
03034     if (ob->adt)
03035         BKE_relink_animdata(ob->adt);
03036 
03037     ID_NEW(ob->parent);
03038 
03039     ID_NEW(ob->proxy);
03040     ID_NEW(ob->proxy_group);
03041 }
03042 
03043 MovieClip *object_get_movieclip(Scene *scene, Object *ob, int use_default)
03044 {
03045     MovieClip *clip= use_default ? scene->clip : NULL;
03046     bConstraint *con= ob->constraints.first, *scon= NULL;
03047 
03048     while (con) {
03049         if (con->type==CONSTRAINT_TYPE_CAMERASOLVER) {
03050             if (scon==NULL || (scon->flag&CONSTRAINT_OFF))
03051                 scon= con;
03052         }
03053 
03054         con= con->next;
03055     }
03056 
03057     if (scon) {
03058         bCameraSolverConstraint *solver= scon->data;
03059         if ((solver->flag&CAMERASOLVER_ACTIVECLIP)==0)
03060             clip= solver->clip;
03061         else
03062             clip= scene->clip;
03063     }
03064 
03065     return clip;
03066 }
